translation.en: He's the one taking me for granted.
translation.zh: 是 他 不 把 我 当回 事

translation.en: -Okay? -Okay…
translation.zh: - 好 吧   - 好的

translation.en: Are you mad at me?
translation.zh: 你 在 生 我 的 气 吗 ？

translation.en: You weren't replying to my texts.
translation.zh: 你 不 回 我 短信

translation.en: I've been calling your office phone, but the line is always busy.
translation.zh: 我 一直 在 打 你 办公室 的 电话   但 总是 占线

translation.en: I've tried calling your cell, but you're rejecting my calls.
translation.zh: 我 给 你 打 过 电话   但 你 一直 不 接

translation.en: At least now you know how it feels.
translation.zh: 至少 现在 你 知道 那 是 什么 感觉 了

translation.en: My God, Betsy, please be reasonable.
translation.zh: 我 的 天啊   贝切 伊   拜托 讲点 道理

translation.en: Just because I don't pick up your calls or reply to your texts,
translation.zh: 我 不 接 你 电话   不 回 你 短信

translation.en: it doesn't mean I don't want to talk to you. It doesn't mean I don't want to talk to you.
translation.zh: 并不 代表 我 不 想 跟 你 说话

translation.en: We had a deadline, okay?
translation.zh: 我们 有 最后 期限 的   好 吗 ？

translation.en: You know what? Never mind.
translation.zh: 你 知道 吗 ？ 没关系

translation.en: Let's not talk about this.
translation.zh: 我们 别谈 这个 了

translation.en: Forget it.
translation.zh: 算了 吧

translation.en: Did you come here to argue or to apologize?
translation.zh: 你 是 来 吵架 的 还是 来 道歉 的 ？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好 吧

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: What kind of apology is that? It doesn't sound sincere.
translation.zh: 这 算 什么 道歉   听起来 并不 真诚

translation.en: What do you want me to do?
translation.zh: 你 想 让 我 怎么 做 ？

translation.en: You want me to get down on my knees?
translation.zh: 你 想 让 我 跪 下来 吗 ？

translation.en: Okay. Here.
translation.zh: 好   看 着

translation.en: Betsy, I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 贝切 伊   对不起

translation.en: That's too much…
translation.zh: 太 过分 了

translation.en: What's wrong with your hand?
translation.zh: 你 的 手 怎么 了 ？

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好 吗 ？

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Are you sure you're okay?
translation.zh: 你 确定 你 没事 吗 ？

translation.en: Yes, I'm okay.
translation.zh: 是的   我 没事

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -I'll get that. -No, I got it.
translation.zh: - 我 来 拿   - 不用   我 拿 吧

translation.en: -Come on. -I'll do it.
translation.zh: - 快点   - 我 来 吧

translation.en: Suit yourself. ‎Excuse me.
translation.zh: - 随 你 便   - 失陪 一下

translation.en: How long have you been friends with my son?
translation.zh: 你 跟 我 儿子 做 朋友 多久 了 ？

translation.en: Just recently.
translation.zh: 就是 最近

translation.en: Well, he never mentions anything about you.
translation.zh: 他 从不 提 你 的 事

translation.en: Come to think of it, Mikey hardly tells us anything.
translation.zh: 想想 看   迈克尔 几乎 什么 都 不 告诉 我们

translation.en: He's always in his room with his computer.
translation.zh: 他 总是 在 房间 里 玩 电脑

translation.en: By the way, is your family affiliated with a church group?
translation.zh: 对 了   你 家人 有 宗教 信仰 吗 ？

translation.en: We're not.
translation.zh: 我们 没有

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 你 是 什么 意思 ？

translation.en: My family is not really religious.
translation.zh: 我 家人 不 信教

translation.en: We're more socially conscious than religious.
translation.zh: 我们 更 多 的 是 社会 意识   而 不是 宗教 意识

translation.en: Oh, that's okay.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: You know,
translation.zh: 你 知道 的

translation.en: God is always in our hearts and in our spirits.
translation.zh: 上帝 总是 在 我们 的 心中   在 我们 的 精神 中

translation.en: So, even if you rarely go to church,
translation.zh: 所以 即使 你 很 少 去 教堂

translation.en: if Jesus is in your heart and your spirit,
translation.zh: 只要 耶稣 在 你 的 心里   在 你 的 精神 里

translation.en: that should suffice.
translation.zh: 那 就 足够 了

translation.en: But I assume you're Catholic, even if you're not active in church?
translation.zh: 但 我 猜 你 是 天主教徒   即使 你 不怎么 去 教堂 ？

translation.en: We are.
translation.zh: 我们 是

translation.en: But…
translation.zh: 但是 …

translation.en: But what?
translation.zh: 但 那 又 如何 ？

translation.en: We stopped discussing religion at home
translation.zh: 自从 我 妈妈 加入 这个 运动 后

translation.en: ever since my mom joined the movement.
translation.zh: 我们 就 不 再 在 家里 讨论 宗教 了

translation.en: Movement? As in…
translation.zh: 运动 ？

translation.en: the rebel movement?
translation.zh: 反叛 运动 ？

translation.en: Oh, yes! In fact, my godfather holds one of the top positions in the NPA.
translation.zh: 是的   其实 我 教父   在 新 人民 军中 担任 要职

translation.en: And my mom joined them.
translation.zh: 我 妈妈 也 加入 了 他们

translation.en: Your mom joined them?
translation.zh: 你 妈妈 也 加入 了 他们 ？

translation.en: Yes. They went to live in the mountains.
translation.zh: 是的   他们 去 山里 住 了

translation.en: You told my mom that your mom's a communist?
translation.zh: 你 跟 我 妈 说 你 妈妈 是 共产主义者 ？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: You told me to just be myself when I'm talking to them.
translation.zh: 你 告诉 我   跟 他们 说话 的 时候 要 做 我 自己

translation.en: Are you sure about your decision? It may just be a petty fight.
translation.zh: 你 对 你 的 决定 有 把握 吗 ？   这 可能 只是 一 场 小打小闹

translation.en: -Stefi is right. -No, we're done.
translation.zh: - 埃斯特法尼娅 是 对 的   - 不   我们 完了

translation.en: It's the end.
translation.zh: 结束 了

translation.en: You've been in a relationship with Maritess for two years,
translation.zh: 你 跟 玛丽丝 在一起 两 年 了

translation.en: and you're just ending it like it's nothing?
translation.zh: 就 这么 结束 了   就 像 什么 都 没 发生 过 一样 ？

translation.en: Well, I finally came to my senses. I've had enough.
translation.zh: 我 终于 清醒 过来 了   我 受够 了

translation.en: Come on, let me see how this looks.
translation.zh: 来 吧   让 我 看看 怎么样

translation.en: Martin, you've been playing the martyr for so long,
translation.zh: 马丁   你 扮演 殉道者 这么 久 了

translation.en: but you've realized that just now?
translation.zh: 但 你 现在 才 意识 到 吗 ？

translation.en: But you know what?
translation.zh: 但 你 知道 吗 ？

translation.en: It actually feels good after having a lovers' quarrel…
translation.zh: 恋人 吵架 后 的 感觉 其实 很 好

translation.en: because you get to be sweet to your partner again.
translation.zh: 因为 你 又 可以 对 对方 温柔 了

translation.en: Look at you.
translation.zh: 看看 你

translation.en: Just because you got that accountant under your spell,
translation.zh: 就 因为 你 迷上 了 那个 会计

translation.en: you think you're a love guru?
translation.zh: 你 就 以为 自己 是 爱情 大师 了 ？

translation.en: -Hey, that's harsh. -She's right!
translation.zh: - 好 刻薄 啊   - 她 说 得 对

translation.en: But you know,
translation.zh: 但 你 知道

translation.en: I still argue with Michael for the pettiest reasons.
translation.zh: 我 还是 会 因为 一些 微不足道 的 原因   跟 迈克尔 争吵

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么 ？

translation.en: Why would you do that?
translation.zh: 你 为什么 要 这样 做 ？

translation.en: I noticed we become sweeter with each other after we make up.
translation.zh: 我 注意 到 我们 和 好后 变得 更 甜蜜 了

translation.en: And if we don't fight that much, the relationship gets boring.
translation.zh: 如果 我们 不 经常 吵架   我们 的 关系 就 会 变得 无聊

translation.en: Wait a second.
translation.zh: 等 一下

translation.en: Between you and Michael,
translation.zh: 在 你 和 迈克尔 之间

translation.en: who's the sadist and who's the masochist?
translation.zh: 谁 是 施虐狂   谁 是 受虐狂 ？

translation.en: Let's just look for another restaurant.
translation.zh: 我们 再 找 一家 餐厅 吧

translation.en: We can't find a parking spot.
translation.zh: 我们 找 不 到 停车位

translation.en: We'll find one. Don't give up so easily!
translation.zh: 我们 会 找到 的   不要 那么 轻易 放弃

translation.en: Let's check here.
translation.zh: 我们 看看 这里

translation.en: -Look, I think that car is leaving. -Finally.
translation.zh: - 看   那 辆 车 应该 要 走 了   - 终于 找到 了

translation.en: See? I told you so.
translation.zh: 看 吧   我 告诉 过 你 的

translation.en: We wouldn't find this spot if we gave up and left.
translation.zh: 如果 我们 放弃   离开 了   就 找 不 到 这个 地方 了

translation.en: Can you believe these idiots?
translation.zh: 你 能 相信 这些 白痴 吗 ？

translation.en: -Betsy, don't! -But that's our spot!
translation.zh: - 贝切 伊   别   - 但 那 是 我们 的 位置

translation.en: -Stop it! -They have no right to take it!
translation.zh: - 停下   - 他们 没 权利 占用

translation.en: Betsy, stop!
translation.zh: 贝切 伊   住手

translation.en: Where are you going?
translation.zh: 你 要 去 哪儿 ？

translation.en: Betsy!
translation.zh: 贝切 伊

translation.en: Hey, this is our spot. Move it!
translation.zh: 这是 我们 的 位置   让 开

translation.en: -Betsy, please calm down. -Let me go!
translation.zh: - 贝切 伊   请 冷静 下来   - 放开 我

translation.en: -We were here first! -Enough…
translation.zh: - 我们 先来 的   - 够 了

translation.en: -Why don't you fight back? -Betsy…
translation.zh: - 你 为什么 不 反击 ？   - 贝切伊

translation.en: -How dare you! -Betsy…
translation.zh: - 你 好大 的 胆子   - 贝切 伊…

translation.en: You can't just steal this spot!
translation.zh: 你 不 能 就 这么 偷走 这个 位置

translation.en: -What's your problem? -No, we're sorry.
translation.zh: - 你 有 什么 问题 ？   - 没有   我们 很 抱歉

translation.en: You are the problem! You stole our parking space!
translation.zh: 你 就是 问题 所在   你 偷 了 我们 的 停车位

translation.en: -Hey, we were here first! -No way! We got here first!
translation.zh: - 喂   我们 先来 的   - 不 可能   我们 先来 的

translation.en: -Move your car somewhere else! -But we were here first!
translation.zh: - 把 你 的 车挪 到 别的 地方 去   - 但是 我们 先来 的

translation.en: Shit!
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: Bro… Maybe we can--
translation.zh: 兄弟   也许 我们 可以 …

translation.en: Michael!
translation.zh: 迈克尔

translation.en: You and Michael are close, aren't you?
translation.zh: 你 和 迈克尔 关系 很 好   对 吧 ？

translation.en: Why don't you talk to him?
translation.zh: 你 为什么 不 跟 他 谈谈 ？

translation.en: But Auntie…
translation.zh: 但是 阿姨 …

translation.en: I think that girl is a bad influence on him.
translation.zh: 我 认为 那个 女孩 在 带坏 他

translation.en: Auntie, Michael is way past the age of puberty.
translation.zh: 阿姨   迈克尔 早就 过 了 青春期 了

translation.en: I'm sure he knows what he's doing.
translation.zh: 我 相信 他 知道 自己 在 做 什么

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.zh: 你 确定 ？

translation.en: To get beaten up just because of that brat?
translation.zh: 就 因为 那个 小鬼 被 揍 了 吗 ？

translation.en: You know your cousin is a bit naive when it comes to girls.
translation.zh: 你 知道 一 遇到 女孩 的 事   你 表弟 就 有点 天真

translation.en: Betsy is not a bad person.
translation.zh: 贝切 伊 不是 坏人

translation.en: Was she the one who punched me?
translation.zh: 是 她 打 我 的 吗 ？

translation.en: And you know what?
translation.zh: 你 知道 吗 ？

translation.en: What you're doing is the opposite of being a Christian.
translation.zh: 你 的 所作所为 跟 基督徒 是 背道而驰 的

translation.en: You're judging a person without knowing her.
translation.zh: 你 在 不 了解 一个 人 的 情况 下   对 她 评头论足

translation.en: That's against the Bible!
translation.zh: 这是 违反 《 圣经 》 的

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们 走

translation.en: God bless you, Auntie.
translation.zh: 上帝 保佑 你   阿姨

translation.en: You too, Uncle.
translation.zh: 还有 你   叔叔

translation.en: Dude, can you tell me what really happened?
translation.zh: 兄弟   你 能 告诉 我   到底 发生 了 什么 事 吗 ？

translation.en: How did you end up in a fight?
translation.zh: 你们 最后 怎么 打 起来 了 ？

translation.en: I'm not in the mood to tell you.
translation.zh: 我 没 心情 告诉 你

translation.en: Mikey, dude, I just want to ask…
translation.zh: 迈克尔   兄弟   我 只 想 问

translation.en: -Are you really serious with that girl? -Of course, I am.
translation.zh: - 你 对 那个 女孩 是 认真 的 吗 ？   - 当然 了

translation.en: Come on! You don't sound so sure!
translation.zh: 拜托   听起来 你 不 太 肯定

translation.en: When I first saw this, I told myself, it's about time.
translation.zh: 我 第一 次 看到 这个 的 时候   就 告诉 自己   是 时候 了

translation.en: About time for what?
translation.zh: 是 什么 时候 了 ？

translation.en: For you to wear trendy clothes!
translation.zh: 让 你 穿上 时髦 的 衣服

translation.en: You look a lot older than your age because of the clothes you wear.
translation.zh: 因为 你 的 穿着   让 你 看起来 比 实际 年龄 老 很多

translation.en: Look, it suits you well!
translation.zh: 看 吧   很 适合 你

translation.en: It looks good on you!
translation.zh: 你 穿 很 好看

translation.en: Look!
translation.zh: 看 啊

translation.en: Not your type?
translation.zh: 不是 你 喜欢 的 类型 吗 ？

translation.en: You don't like it?
translation.zh: 你 不 喜欢 ？

translation.en: -No, it's just that-- -But you still don't like it.
translation.zh: - 不是   只是 …   - 但 你 还是 不 喜欢 它

translation.en: -Maybe I'll wear it-- -Give it back.
translation.zh: - 也许 我 会 穿   - 退 回去

translation.en: What's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么 了 ？

translation.en: You don't like it!
translation.zh: 你 不 喜欢

translation.en: -I want-- -You want to return it!
translation.zh: - 我 想 …   - 你 想 退货

translation.en: I like it, okay?
translation.zh: 我 喜欢   好 吗 ？

translation.en: All I'm asking for is a little appreciation!
translation.zh: 我 想要 的 只是 一点 赞赏 而已

translation.en: -He's conservative. -You mean he's not fashionable?
translation.zh: - 他 很 保守   - 你 是 说 他 不时 髦 ？

translation.en: Aside from that, he's too stingy!
translation.zh: 除此之外   他 太 小气 了

translation.en: We've only been to one restaurant since we started dating!
translation.zh: 自从 开始 约会 以来   我们 只 去 过 一家 餐厅

translation.en: The one that's cheap but has big servings!
translation.zh: 便宜 但 分量 大 的 那种

translation.en: The eat-all-you-can style!
translation.zh: 自助餐

translation.en: Okay, so Mr. Intelligent and Elegant…
translation.zh: 好 吧   这位 聪明 和 优雅 先生

translation.en: turned out to be outdated and cheap?
translation.zh: 落伍 又 廉价 ？

translation.en: Now, you're having doubts…
translation.zh: 现在 你 开始 怀疑 了

translation.en: because he's not the man of your fantasies?
translation.zh: 因为 他 不是 你 的 梦 中 情人 ？

translation.en: Sis, remember this.
translation.zh: 姐妹   记住 这 一点

translation.en: They are never the people you think they are.
translation.zh: 他们 从来 都 不是 你 想 的 那种 人

translation.en: Are you okay?
translation.zh: 你 没事 吧 ？

translation.en: I'm exhausted.
translation.zh: 我 累坏 了

translation.en: I took a lot of calls…
translation.zh: 我 接 了 很多 电话

translation.en: and my jaw hurts from speaking with an accent.
translation.zh: 我 下巴 疼   因为 说话 时 带口 音

translation.en: So, where do you want to go?
translation.zh: 所以 你 想 去 哪儿 ？

translation.en: It's up to you.
translation.zh: 听 你 的

translation.en: You wanted to hang out, so you decide.
translation.zh: 你 想 出去 玩   所以 你 决定

translation.en: -Let's just watch a movie. -A movie?
translation.zh: - 我们 看 电影 吧   - 电影 ？

translation.en: Why not?
translation.zh: 好 啊

translation.en: There's nothing good to watch.
translation.zh: 没 什么 好看 的

translation.en: Then let's just go to the mall.
translation.zh: 那 我们 去 逛 商场 吧

translation.en: Again? Can we go somewhere else?
translation.zh: 又 去 ？ 我们 可以 去 别的 地方 吗 ？

translation.en: -What do you think? -Let's just eat outside.
translation.zh: - 你 觉得 呢 ？   - 我们 出去 吃饭 吧

translation.en: I'm still full. My officemate brought food for his birthday.
translation.zh: 我 还 饱 着   我 同事 过 生日   带 了 吃 的 来

translation.en: I had two plates of spaghetti.
translation.zh: 我 吃 了 两 盘 意大利面

translation.en: So, where should we go?
translation.zh: 那 我们 该 去 哪儿 呢 ？

translation.en: You rejected my suggestions and now you're asking me again?
translation.zh: 你 拒绝 了 我 的 建议   现在 又 来 问 我 ？

translation.en: Hang on, why are you mad?
translation.zh: 等等   你 为什么 生气 ？

translation.en: I'm not mad.
translation.zh: 我 没生气

translation.en: Just tell me where we're going.
translation.zh: 告诉 我 我们 要 去 哪儿

translation.en: Nobody said that a relationship between two people…
translation.zh: 没有 人 说 两 个人 谈恋爱

translation.en: would only be filled with happy days.
translation.zh: 都 是 快乐 的 时光

translation.en: Because no two people are alike.
translation.zh: 因为 没有 两 个人 是 一样 的

translation.en: And because of their differences,
translation.zh: 因为 他们 的 不同

translation.en: their love may begin to bloom…
translation.zh: 当 误解 开始 增长 时

translation.en: while misunderstandings start to grow.
translation.zh: 他们 的 爱 可能 开始 绽放

translation.en: That's how relationships are.
translation.zh: 恋爱 就是 这样

translation.en: Similar, opposites, yet still together.
translation.zh: 相似 、 对立   但 仍然 在一起

translation.en: Nobody is perfect.
translation.zh: 没有 人 是 完美 的

translation.en: These imperfections give depth to a relationship.

translation.en: -Oh! Here he is. -Sorry I'm late.

translation.en: Our customers don't like to think of their kids as being sad.

translation.en: I like kites.

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: 很 好

translation.en: Okay, great. She's flying a kite.

translation.en: She's running with a kite. She's running out of steam.

translation.en: Oh, no. We see her face, it's sad.

translation.en: -But not too sad. DAVE: Right.

translation.en: Look, I can't do this right now, okay?

translation.en: Mothers.

translation.en: The "size of Theodore's butt"?

translation.en: Why don't we come back to that?

translation.en: Anyway, 10 years ago, the market share for healthy food snacks... ...was imperceptible among 6- to 12-year-olds.

translation.en: ...was imperceptible among 6- to 12-year-olds.
translation.zh: 是 由 6 到 12 岁 的 儿童 构成

translation.en: MAN: "How smart Simon thinks he is"?

translation.en: Yeah, as opposed to how smart he actually is.

translation.en: Who's Simon?

translation.en: We didn't know.

translation.en: -We're sorry, Dave. -Oh, you're sorry? That's fantastic.

translation.en: -Oh, my God. Theodore, did you just--? -Um, um....

translation.en: It's a raisin, Dave.

translation.en: Prove it.

translation.en: Okay, you got me. I wanna talk to all you guys. Where's Alvin?

translation.en: DAVE: Alvin? -You owe me bigtime.

translation.en: Alvin.

translation.en: There's this new thing. It's called knocking.

translation.en: -Get out. -Uh, I'm waiting for the rinse cycle.

translation.en: -Out. -Whoa, whoa. I'm taking a shower here.

translation.en: You know, if I made a list of my worst days ever... ...today would be at the top of the list.

translation.en: And it's still early.

translation.en: Clam it, sudsy.

translation.en: Okay. Guys, let me just put it to you like this, okay?

translation.en: I have no job, no career, my house is always a mess. Thank you very much.

translation.en: That was weird. I guess I'm just a little nervous about coming over for dinner.

translation.en: -Dinner. -So, yeah. I'm gonna hang up now.

translation.en: -Dinner. -So, yeah. I'm gonna hang up now. I'll be there at 7. Okay. Bye.

translation.en: I'll be there at 7. Okay. Bye.

translation.en: Claire is Dave's mate. Ooh-la-la.

translation.en: She is not my mate. She's my ex-mate.

translation.en: Okay. This is great.

translation.en: That hurts, Dave. That really hurts.

translation.en: -Yeah. We're all in this together, Dave. -Like a family.

translation.en: No. Not like a family.
translation.zh: 才 不 像 一家人

translation.en: -Tick-tock, Dave. Better bust a move. -Right.

translation.en: We also do offices and recreational vehicles.

translation.en: I gotta admit I'm surprised.

translation.en: -Those bread sticks smell great. THEODORE: Yeah.

translation.en: ...but it's just gonna be Claire and me.

translation.en: Whoa, hold the phone, Dave. -We can't have-- -No.
translation.zh: - 你 是 说 我们 不 能 …   - 不 能

translation.en: -Even if we-- DAVE: No.
translation.zh: - 连 …   - 没有

translation.en: -We thought it-- -And no. Look, in the other room.

translation.en: Jeez.

translation.en: It takes longer. But when it comes to flavor, why rush?

translation.en: Well, I'm impressed.

translation.en: I've been seeing your photos in the paper. Yeah, it's going really great.

translation.en: Great. Loving it.

translation.en: How do you think it's going?

translation.en: Terrible. They're not even sniffing each other.

translation.en: -Is it me, or was he a little mad? -Oh, hm, hm.

translation.en: Okay. New rule. No going out after 9. And not at all unless I know where you're going.

translation.en: Oh.

translation.en: -Sorry. -Kids, huh?

translation.en: Well, some days are better than others.

translation.en: Oh.

translation.en: Aw.

translation.en: -What? -Well, in case you didn't notice... ...I don't have a job anymo--

translation.en: My song?

translation.en: And that video of your little guys, 10 million hits already on YouTube.
translation.zh: 还有 那段 小家伙 的 视频   影片 分享 網站 上 点击率   已经 超 千万 了

translation.zh: 宾果 ！

translation.en: Ha-ha-ha. It's crazy. I gotta go.

translation.en: Hey, put some clothes on those guys. It's kind of embarrassing.
translation.zh: 给 他们 穿 点 衣服   现在 这样子 有点 不 好 见 人

translation.en: We owed you, Dave.

translation.en: THEODORE: So we're good with the toaster waffles, right? Uh, Dave?
translation.zh: 这样   可以 买 方便 松饼 了 吧 ？   戴夫 ？

translation.en: DAVE: Soup's on.
translation.zh: 汤 好 了

translation.en: Alvin.
translation.zh: 艾文 ！

translation.en: So, what do you think?
translation.zh: 喜欢 吗 ？

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 很 酷

translation.en: -Theodore, wake up. It's Christmas. -Come on, man. It's Christmas.

translation.en: Come and get munk'd with the Munks Stop, stop. Come on, guys. We need more energy, okay?

translation.en: Stop, stop. Come on, guys. We need more energy, okay?

translation.en: We need more dry ice. We need more, you know, wow. All right?

translation.en: We need more dry ice. We need more, you know, wow. All right? We're the Chipmunks, for crying out loud.

translation.en: -What is that? -It's dance.

translation.en: Oh, is it dancing? Well, next time say, you know, "I'm the dance guy--" Hello?

translation.en: -Just let me talk to the guys. -I don't think that's such a good idea.

translation.en: -That's not what happened. -Denial.

translation.en: Twelve?

translation.en: Look, I just wanted to say hi. See how they're doing.

translation.en: They're doing great. They're loving life.

translation.en: They're doing great. They're loving life. Living large.

translation.en: Face it, Dave. They've moved on.

translation.en: -They're happy now. -Look, Ian, I wanna talk to them.

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think that's gonna happen, Dave.

translation.en: They're not ready for something like that. They're just kids.

translation.en: -I'm gonna see them. -Look, Dave, I'm-- Wait.

translation.en: Ian... ...was that Dave?

translation.en: Uh, yes. Yes, it was.

translation.en: He wanted me to let you know he's great and he's happy. He's really, really happy. So.... All right.

translation.en: He's really, really happy. So.... All right.

translation.en: Yeah, I know. I guess he's busy, you know. Got better things to do.

translation.en: ...I had to put together 37 dates in 42 days, in 16 different countries. And I had to coordinate 121 different radio and print interviews...

translation.en: [Betty] I ain't never seen Mama and Daddy so proud as that day.
translation.zh: 我 从未 见 过 妈妈 和 爸爸 那么 骄傲

translation.en: [Betty] Now, all Roscoe had to do was claim the real prize.
translation.zh: 现在 罗斯科 要 做 的   就是 去 领取 他 真正 的 奖品

translation.en: -Lucinda? -Hey.
translation.zh: 露辛达

translation.en: Will you go to the Spring Formal with me?
translation.zh: 你 能 和 我 一起 去 春季 舞会 吗 ？

translation.en: Oh, Roscoe, how sweet, but... Clyde just asked me.
translation.zh: 罗斯科   真 贴心   可克莱德 刚 已经 问 过 我 了

translation.en: Come on, Lucinda, let's get a strawberry soda.
translation.zh: 来 吧   露辛达   我们 去 喝 草莓 汽水 吧

translation.en: -My treat. -[Lucinda] Okay.
translation.zh: 我 请客   好的

translation.en: Bye, Roscoe. Great race.
translation.zh: 拜拜   罗斯科   刚才 你 真棒

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 拜拜

translation.en: [Betty] I felt bad for the boy.
translation.zh: 我 真 为 他 感到 难过

translation.en: [Betty] Now, nobody knew about the bet, so Clyde just beat him to the punch.
translation.zh: 没 人 知道 打赌 的 事   所以 克莱德 抢先 下手

translation.en: [Betty] Clyde and Lucinda danced all night long,
translation.zh: 克莱德 和 露辛达 整晚 都 在一起 跳舞

translation.en: looking like eternal lovers.
translation.zh: 就 像 一对 永恒 的 恋人

translation.en: And Roscoe looked like a hot mess.
translation.zh: 而 罗斯科 就 像 热锅上的蚂蚁

translation.en: And his date wasn't much better.
translation.zh: 他 的 舞伴 也 不 怎么样

translation.en: Lord Jesus!
translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: But in typical Roscoe fashion, he snitched.
translation.zh: 但 罗斯科   就 像 他 经常 做 的 那样   去 打小报告 了

translation.en: But that mess backfired.
translation.zh: 但事 与 愿违

translation.en: Lucinda is a young lady, not some trophy you can win!
translation.zh: 露辛达 是 位 年轻 的 女士   不是 你们 的 什么 奖品

translation.en: -I'm very disappointed in you. -But what about Clyde?
translation.zh: 我 真 对 你 感到 失望   但 克莱德 呢 ？

translation.en: Clyde will be dealt with.
translation.zh: 我 会 处罚克莱德 的

translation.en: Now, drop your britches and bend over.
translation.zh: 现在 把 裤子 脱 了   弯下 腰

translation.en: [Betty] But that Clyde... Oh, girl, he is a smooth operator.
translation.zh: 但 这个 克莱德   他 真是 狡猾

translation.en: All right, what have you got to say for yourself?
translation.zh: 好的   你 还有 什么 要 说 的 ？

translation.en: I let Roscoe win.
translation.zh: 是 我 让 罗斯科赢 的

translation.en: It meant more to him to beat me.
translation.zh: 他 太 想 战胜 我 了

translation.en: And it meant more to me to go out with Lucinda.
translation.zh: 对于 我 来说   和 露辛 达 一起 意味着 一切

translation.en: She's so beautiful.
translation.zh: 她 太 漂亮 了

translation.en: I know you're disappointed.
translation.zh: 我 知道 你 很 失望

translation.en: And if my parents were alive, they'd be disappointed too.
translation.zh: 如果 我 的 父母 还 在世   他们 也 会 很 失望 的

translation.en: But you're the only parent I got, Papa Jenkins.
translation.zh: 但 你 是 我 唯一 的 家长   杰金斯 爸爸

translation.en: So you do what you think is right. I'll understand.
translation.zh: 所以 做 你 认为 对 的 事   我 能 理解

translation.en: Don't you ever let something like this ever happen again.
translation.zh: 不许 再 发生 这种 事情

translation.en: [whispers] What?
translation.zh: 什么 ？

translation.en: You understand?
translation.zh: 你 懂 了 吗 ？

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是   先生

translation.en: [Betty] He went upstairs and cried like a baby.
translation.zh: 他 上楼 去 像 个 孩子 一样 哭 了

translation.en: Now, how you know Roscoe was crying?
translation.zh: 你 怎么 知道 罗斯科 在 哭 呢 ？

translation.en: -[sobs] -[Betty] Because all his hollering woke me up from a sound sleep. -[young RJ sobbing] -[laughs]
translation.zh: 因为 他 嚎哭 的 声音 把 我 吵醒 了

translation.en: So, are they still an item?
translation.zh: 那么   他们 还 在一起 吗 ？

translation.en: They dated awhile, but you know,
translation.zh: 他们 约会 过 一阵

translation.en: They dated awhile, but you know, the Queen is too pure for the likes of Clyde.
translation.zh: 但 对于 克莱德 这种 人 来说

translation.en: the Queen is too pure for the likes of Clyde.
translation.zh: 皇后 太 纯洁 了

translation.en: He needs a real woman.
translation.zh: 他 需要 一个 真正 的 女人

translation.en: -Betty, y'all are cousins. -Whatever!
translation.zh: 贝蒂   你们 是 堂 兄妹   那 又 怎么样 ？

translation.en: Now, the point is, Roscoe ain't been the same since Clyde stole Miss Lucinda.
translation.zh: 现在 重点 在于   克莱德偷 走露 辛达 之后   罗斯科 就 变 了

translation.en: [chuckles] I think they call that "evolution."
translation.zh: 人们 管 这个 叫 “ 成长 ”

translation.en: RJ's clearly over any childhood crush.
translation.zh: 显然   罗杰 已经 把 小时候 的 恋情 放下 了

translation.en: -[Betty] Really? -Really.
translation.zh: - 真的 吗 ？   - 真的

translation.en: Well, where do you think that "Team of Me" mess started?
translation.zh: 那 你 觉得   “ 我 之 队 ” 是 哪儿 来 的 想法 ？

translation.en: -[chuckles] -All right, Betty, that is enough.
translation.zh: 好 了   贝蒂   够 了

translation.en: Okay, Mama, but I'm just saying--
translation.zh: 好的   妈妈   但 我 才 刚 开始 说

translation.en: Come on in this house before I pop you.
translation.zh: 在 我 揍 你 之前   你 进屋 去 吧

translation.en: [Betty] Now, somebody help that white girl.
translation.zh: 来 人帮 帮 那个 白人 女孩 吧

translation.en: She getting eggshells in the tater salad. Help her.
translation.zh: 她 把 蛋壳 弄到 沙拉 里面 去 了   帮帮 她

translation.en: [Mama J] Always running your mouth! You talk too much.
translation.zh: 管 好 你 的 嘴   你 说 得 太 多 了

translation.en: [Betty] Don't nobody want no crunchy-ass potato salad.
translation.zh: 没 人 想 吃 那样 脆 的 沙拉

translation.en: -And you put vinegar on these? -Yeah.
translation.zh: 你 在 上面 加 醋汁 了 ？

translation.en: [RJ] You gotta market these, O.
translation.zh: 你 这 手艺 能 赚 不少 钱 呢   欧

translation.en: -RJ! -Huh?
translation.zh: 罗杰

translation.en: What the hell are you eating?
translation.zh: 你 在 吃 什么 ？

translation.en: I'm not eating, baby, I'm tasting these soy ribs.
translation.zh: 我 没 吃   我 就是 尝尝   宝贝   这是 酱肋骨

translation.en: -You want some? -Ugh! Forget it, carnivore!
translation.zh: 你 来 点 吗 ？   算了 吧   食肉族

translation.en: Why don't you tell me about Lucinda Allen?
translation.zh: 你 跟 我 说 说露 辛达 艾伦 吧 ？

translation.en: -Oh. Oh, shit. -Oh.
translation.zh: 该死 的

translation.en: -[RJ] Lucinda Allen? -That was a bad one.
translation.zh: - 露辛达 艾伦   - 这 可 糟 了

translation.en: Well, see, I... -[woman screams] -Baby, she's just, you know...
translation.zh: 好 吧   宝贝   她 就是 …

translation.en: [screaming] Oh, my God! Oh, my God! Hey, Clyde's here now!
translation.zh: 天啊 …克莱德 来 了

translation.en: Let me introduce you.
translation.zh: 让 我 来 介绍 一下

translation.en: [Clyde] What's up, family?
translation.zh: 最近 怎么样 ？ 兄弟们

translation.en: -Hi! Hey there, baby. What's up, baby? -[Betty chuckles]
translation.zh: 宝贝   最近 怎么样 ？

translation.en: -You looking sharp. Look at you. Betty, you too much.
translation.zh: - 你 看起来 真 不错   - 贝蒂   别 这么 见外

translation.en: -[Otis] Clyde! -What's up, O? What's up, Big Law?
translation.zh: - 克莱德   - 过 得 怎么样 ？

translation.en: I see you ain't getting no bigger. Look at you, boy.
translation.zh: 我 看 你 没 胖 啊   看看 你   伙计

translation.en: [Otis] Lucinda, what's up, baby?
translation.zh: 露辛达   最近 怎么样 ？

translation.en: -Oh, my God, hi! -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: Good seeing you, baby.
translation.zh: 很 高兴 见到 你

translation.en: Hey, look at you, boy. Look. You sure you our relative?
translation.zh: 看看 你   伙计   你 确定 是 我 的 亲戚 吗 ？

translation.en: [chuckles] Little Mexican.
translation.zh: 小墨西哥人

translation.en: [Clyde] I got a little something for everybody.
translation.zh: 我 给 每个 人 都 带 了 点 东西

translation.en: I stopped to pick up some red velvet cakes for the picnic.
translation.zh: 我 为 野餐 买 了 些 红 丝绒 蛋糕

translation.en: From Cooter's Bakery in Tuscaloosa?
translation.zh: 从 图斯卡沙 的 库特面 包房 买 的 ？

translation.en: Well, you only get one golden anniversary, Mama J.
translation.zh: 金婚 纪念日 就 只有 一 次   杰 妈妈

translation.en: -[people exclaiming] -[Clyde] Uh-oh. [Clyde] There he is! What's up, Papa J? How you doing, man?
translation.zh: 他 来 了   最近 怎么样 啊 ？ 杰 爸爸

translation.en: Is the fountain of youth around here somewhere,
translation.zh: 青春 之 泉 就 在 这 附近 吧 ？

translation.en: or you been taking that Viagra?
translation.zh: 要不 你 准 是 吃 了 伟哥

translation.en: -You better watch it. -[both chuckle]
translation.zh: 你 最好 试 一 试

translation.en: -See, 'Cinda? -[Papa J] Lucinda!
translation.zh: - 看   辛达   - 露辛达

translation.en: I'm so glad to see you. Welcome home. Oh! Oh!
translation.zh: 见到 你 真 高兴   欢迎 回家

translation.en: Now that's nostalgia for you, right there. Family spirit award goes to Roscoe!
translation.zh: 好久 不见   今年 的 家庭 精神 奖 颁给 罗斯科

translation.en: Cross Colour Jones! Look at you, boy!
translation.zh: 杂色 系琼斯   看看 你   小子

translation.en: Still wearing Otis' hand-me-downs. Come here, man.
translation.zh: 还 穿着 欧提斯 的 旧 衣服 呢   过来   伙计

translation.en: Well, the airlines lost my bag, so...
translation.zh: 航空 公司 把 我 的 行李 弄 丢 了   所以 …

translation.en: What's your excuse?
translation.zh: 你 穿成 这样 的 借口 是 什么 ？

translation.en: [chuckles] Man... Hey, man, this, that Tiger Hoods, man.
translation.zh: 伙计   这 可是 泰格 伍兹 啊

translation.en: You know me. I get my nine holes in.
translation.zh: 你 知道 的   我 喜欢 高尔夫

translation.en: -[Clyde chuckles] -Roscoe Jenkins.
translation.zh: 罗斯科 杰金斯

translation.en: -Oh. -[chuckles] Oh, it's been ages.
translation.zh: 好多 年 没 见 了

translation.en: -Oh. -Oh, wow, it's been so long!
translation.zh: 真的 很 长 时间 了

translation.en: Oh, um, Clyde, Lucinda, this is my fiancée,
translation.zh: 克莱德   露辛达   这是 我 的 未婚妻

translation.en: -uh, my fiancée, uh... -Bianca.
translation.zh: - 我 的 未婚妻   - 比 安卡

translation.en: -Bianca. -Bianca Kittles. How you doing? Sweeter than Skittles.
translation.zh: - 比 安卡 基托斯   - 你好   比 安卡

translation.en: -Girl, you prettier in person. -Is that so?
translation.zh: 比彩 虹糖 还 甜   你 本人 真 漂亮

translation.en: You find somebody that say different, see if I don't slap them to sleep.
translation.zh: 如果 有人 说 我 说 的 不对   看 我 不 去 把 他 打趴 下

translation.en: -And I don't even get violent. -It's my pleasure, Bianca. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我 平常 都 不 使用 暴力 的   很 荣幸 能 见到 你   比 安卡

translation.en: -Wow, congratulations, you two. -The pleasure's mine. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 祝贺 你们 两 个   我 也 很 荣幸

translation.en: What's up with that?
translation.zh: 怎么 了 ？

translation.en: And, Lord, we thank you for the pork ribs,
translation.zh: 上帝   我们 谢谢 您 给 我们 猪 肋骨

translation.en: as well as, yes, the coleslaw, and...
translation.zh: 还有 … 卷心 菜沙拉

translation.en: I hear what you're saying, but look, I gotta go.
translation.zh: 我 听见 你 说 的话 了   我 得 挂 了

translation.en: Thank you! And we thank you for the sweet potato pie.
translation.zh: 谢谢 你   我们 谢谢 你 的 红薯派

translation.en: And, yes, for the scrumptious red velvet cakes from Cooter's...
translation.zh: 还有   对 了   为了 美味 的 库特红 丝绒 蛋糕

translation.en: We thank You, Lord! And they all did say...
translation.zh: 我们 谢谢 你   上帝   他们 也 谢谢 你

translation.en: [all] Amen!
translation.zh: 阿门

translation.en: We thank you for that beautiful benediction.
translation.zh: 我们 谢谢 你 的 优美 的 祷告

translation.en: -[Otis] You mean long. -Otis!
translation.zh: - 又 臭 又 长   - 欧提斯

translation.en: Mama and I are just filled with joy.
translation.zh: 妈妈 和 我 非常 高兴

translation.en: So many friends and family have joined us on this very special occasion.
translation.zh: 在 这个 特殊 的 时刻   有 这么 多 的 朋友 家人 到场

translation.en: [Papa J] This woman has put up with me for five decades,
translation.zh: 这个 女人 忍受 了 我 50年

translation.en: and I love her now more than ever.
translation.zh: 我 现在 比 任何 时候 都 爱 她

translation.en: Thank you, baby.
translation.zh: 谢谢   宝贝

translation.en: -[applauds] -[Otis] All right. Hear, hear, now.
translation.zh: 好   杰 爸爸   真 棒

translation.en: [Betty] Clyde, you try some of this corn, baby? Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 克莱德   你 尝尝 玉米   宝贝

translation.en: And don't you forget these rolls, cause I made them with you in mind.
translation.zh: 别 忘 了 这些 面包卷   这是 我 边 想 你 边 做 的

translation.en: -You butter the biscuits? -[laughs] You know I did.
translation.zh: - 还 做 了 饼干 吗 ？   - 你 知道 是 我 做 的

translation.en: -[Otis] Hey, Betty? Betty. -What?
translation.zh: 贝蒂   贝蒂   怎么 了 ？

translation.en: He's your cousin, not a potential tip.
translation.zh: 他 是 你 的 堂兄   不 能 在一起 的

translation.en: You know what, Otis? Okay? Shut up.
translation.zh: 你 知道 吗 ？ 欧提斯   闭嘴

translation.en: Now, I'm just glad to see him, that's all.
translation.zh: 我 只是 见到 他 很 高兴 而已

translation.en: And, and... Okay, you too, queenie.
translation.zh: 好 了   也 给 你 点   小皇 后

translation.en: -Oh. Thank you, Betty. -Mm-hm.
translation.zh: 谢谢   贝蒂

translation.en: So, Lucinda, I hear you two were high school sweethearts.
translation.zh: 露辛达   我 听说 你 俩 在 高中 时 是 一对

translation.en: Oh, well, that was a long time ago.
translation.zh: 那 是 很 久 以前 的 事 了

translation.en: Yeah. But you never forget your first love.
translation.zh: 是   但 初恋 是 忘 不 掉 的

translation.en: Ain't that right, 'Cinda?
translation.zh: 我 说 的 对 吗 ？ 辛达

translation.en: -[Lucinda] Yeah, I guess not. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 是   我 想 是的

translation.en: Look at her. Just as beautiful as ever.
translation.zh: 看看 她   还是 和 以前 一样 漂亮

translation.en: You know, I'm gonna leave some of these hood-rats alone,
translation.zh: 我 要 把 别的 女的 都 抛开

translation.en: get real serious about making this girl Mrs. Stubbs.
translation.zh: 认真 的 把 她 变成 我 的 斯达布夫人

translation.en: You know, matter of fact... Otis, get me a broom right now. I'm gonna jump!
translation.zh: 事实上 …   现在 就 给 我 个 扫帚   我 要 结婚 了

translation.en: -[Otis and Clyde laugh] -Mazel tov! [Clyde] You know what I'm talking about, Otis?
translation.zh: 祝 你 好运   你 懂 吗 ？

translation.en: Don't believe this one, okay?
translation.zh: 别 信 他 的话   行 吗 ？

translation.en: He's more interested in jumping bones than jumping brooms.
translation.zh: 他 对 床 比对 扫帚 兴趣 大多 了

translation.en: Well, best of luck to the both of you. You make a great couple.
translation.zh: 好的   祝福 你们 两 个   你们 是 幸福 的 一对

translation.en: [coughs] Bullshit!
translation.zh: 狗屁

translation.en: Betty!
translation.zh: 贝蒂

translation.en: Excuse me, y'all, I had a piece of celery stuck in my throat.
translation.zh: 抱歉   一 片 芹菜卡 在 嗓子 里 了

translation.en: [Clyde] Well, you know, I admit it. I like to play.
translation.zh: 我 承认   我 很 花心

translation.en: But, after I get me a couple of more dealerships,
translation.zh: 但是   在 我 拿到 更 多 代理权 后

translation.en: I will be King of the South, who will need his Queen.
translation.zh: 我 将 会 成为 南部 之 王   那时 我 就 需要 一个 王后 了

translation.en: Well, my king has a surprise.
translation.zh: 我 的 国王 要 给 大家 一个 惊喜

translation.en: RJ's having a professional camera crew film the anniversary banquet!
translation.zh: 罗杰 请 了 一个 专业 的 摄影 团队   准备 把 周年 晚宴录 下来

translation.en: -[Bianca] Tell them, honey! -[people chattering]
translation.zh: 告诉 他们   甜心

translation.en: Like my baby said, it was supposed to be a surprise.
translation.zh: 正如 宝贝 说 的   这 本来 是 个 惊喜 的

translation.en: A gift, really, you know. Uh, no big deal. Just a...
translation.zh: 一个 礼物   你们 知道   没 什么 大不了 的

translation.en: A gift, really, you know. Uh, no big deal. Just a... Just a little something special for y'all.
translation.zh: 就是 给 你们 大家 的 一个 特殊 的 礼物

translation.en: That's so sweet.
translation.zh: 你 真 贴心

translation.en: Wait a minute. Hold up. Nigga, you got some cameras hidden around?
translation.zh: 等等   伙计   周围 有 隐藏 摄影机 吗 ？

translation.en: -You done brought some cameras? -Reggie...
translation.zh: - 你 带 了 摄像机 吗 ？   - 雷吉

translation.en: You got that shit hidden around here? Oh, y'all seen his show.
translation.zh: 你 把 它们 藏 在 周围 吗 ？   你们 都 看 他 的 节目

translation.en: Roscoe be jumping out of bushes on little midgets.
translation.zh: 罗科斯 跳 过 树丛   跳到 小矮人 面前

translation.en: -[Mama J] Midgets? -[all laugh]
translation.zh: 小矮人 ？

translation.en: Neglected albino children. Al-Qaeda leaders.
translation.zh: 被 抛弃 的 白化病 小孩

translation.en: Neglected albino children. Al-Qaeda leaders. -[chants in Arabic] -Rice, chicken kebab, chicken falafel.
translation.zh: 基地 组织 领导人

translation.en: -[chants in Arabic] -Rice, chicken kebab, chicken falafel.
translation.zh: 大米   鸡肉 串   鸡肉

translation.en: -[singing] -[chuckles] Boy, you crazy.
translation.zh: - 小子   你 疯 了   - 我 告诉 你

translation.en: I'm telling you, they be scattering like roaches, like cops.
translation.zh: 他们 会 四处 逃窜   像 警匪片 里 一样

translation.en: You gonna win a Emmy, and I'm voting for you.
translation.zh: 你 肯定 能 赢艾 美 奖   我 会 给 你 投票

translation.en: Remember, son, this is a family celebration,
translation.zh: 记住   儿子   这个 是 家庭 聚会

translation.en: not some Hollywood production.
translation.zh: 不是 什么 好莱坞 的 作秀

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.zh: 是的   先生

translation.en: Oh, hell, it'll be all right, Papa J.
translation.zh: 见鬼   没事 的   杰 爸爸

translation.en: I'm sure old Roscoe gonna do the right thing.

translation.en: You got a outstanding career, beautiful fiancée, great son.

translation.en: You a sad man, Clyde.

translation.en: Your competitive edge imprisons you.

translation.en: Feel good for what you've done, not for what you haven't.

translation.en: The one loss you suffered at my hands is still a burden to you.

translation.en: Get over it. I have.

translation.en: That's the "Team of Me."

translation.en: [whispers] That's right, baby.

translation.en: Oh! And, uh, just for the record,

translation.en: I'll beat you again. And worse.

translation.en: [all] Oh. -I ain't never reneged on no bet. -You a damn liar!

translation.en: -I ain't never reneged on no bet. -You a damn liar!

translation.en: They were gonna see them anyway.

translation.en: Yeah, that's what I'm talking about. Yeah! Oh, baby.

translation.en: Yeah, that's what I'm talking about. Yeah! Oh, baby. All the time I spent here, I never got a little piece of nothing.

translation.en: All the time I spent here, I never got a little piece of nothing.

translation.en: No way. These walls are way too thin.

translation.en: That's ridiculous!

translation.en: Nope. Forget it.

translation.en: Damn!

translation.en: Think you so damn special.

translation.en: -Who you talking to? -[stammers] Nobody.

translation.en: Yeah, the new and improved... Roscoe 7.0.

translation.en: I think Roscoe 1.0 was just fine.

translation.en: -[Papa J] I didn't know you're back. -We weren't doing nothing!

translation.en: Nothing much, that is.

translation.en: Well, good. -Why don't you give me a hand, Roscoe? -Papa J, I thought you wanted me to help.

translation.en: -Why don't you give me a hand, Roscoe? -Papa J, I thought you wanted me to help.

translation.en: No, that's all right. Roscoe's got this.

translation.en: Yeah, I got this.

translation.en: [Papa J] Son... You are ready to get married, aren't you?

translation.en: [chuckles] Of course! Yeah. Yeah. Why do you ask?

translation.en: Well, if I didn't know any better,

translation.en: I'd think there's something going on between you and Lucinda.

translation.en: Oh, no! [chuckles] I'm just, you know...

translation.en: [stammers] We're just catching up.

translation.en: Daddy, the wedding is gonna be hot. [chuckles]

translation.en: Got the caterer, R. Kelly's singing. Beyoncé is gonna choreograph the Electric Slide.

translation.en: Beyoncé is gonna choreograph the Electric Slide.

translation.en: -[RJ] Um... -Roscoe... I think you know what I'm saying.

translation.en: Your mama and I got married right out there in the front yard.

translation.en: I know, but...

translation.en: Well, Bianca wants a big wedding with all the trimmings.

translation.en: Is that what you want?

translation.en: [stammers] Yeah, I think.

translation.en: I do. I do.
translation.zh: 对   我 愿意 …

translation.en: -How does Jamaal feel about that? -[sighs]

translation.en: Jamaal, he... Jamaal's cool, Daddy.

translation.en: Be mindful of that boy.

translation.en: He never sees his own mother.

translation.en: From what he tells me, he doesn't see much of you, either.

translation.en: I'm trying, Daddy.

translation.en: All right, but the show keeps me so busy-- Oh! The show.

translation.en: Oh! The show. Team of Me.
translation.zh: 节目   我 之 队

translation.en: I never quite understood that.

translation.en: Well, it's just... It's just a saying, you know?

translation.en: "Protect yourself. Be your own man."

translation.en: Well, that's fine, son, but...

translation.en: there are times you gotta depend on others, family and friends.

translation.en: I mean, you never learned anything like that around here.

translation.en: And that's certainly not something you teach a child.

translation.en: Some kids learn it on their own, Daddy.

translation.en: -Honey! -[grunts] I've been busy with a personal project all morning and I'm exhausted, so...

translation.en: I've been busy with a personal project all morning and I'm exhausted, so...

translation.en: Be a dear and walk Fifi for me?

translation.en: Come on, baby. Let Feef run around and enjoy nature.

translation.en: Come on, baby. Let Feef run around and enjoy nature. -[Fifi pants] -I was hoping to get a little nap.

translation.en: -[Fifi pants] -I was hoping to get a little nap.

translation.en: My little man is tired.

translation.en: Well, I promise I'll do any little thing you want if you do this little thing for me.
translation.zh: 好的   如果 你 替 我 做 这 件 小事

translation.en: I'll do any little thing you want if you do this little thing for me.

translation.en: Plus, I want to show you my little project.

translation.en: What project?

translation.en: Damn! [gasps]

translation.en: -Are those my initials? -[Bianca] Mm-hm.

translation.en: I told you it was yours.
translation.zh: 我 说 过 它 是 你 的

translation.en: [chuckles] You're a hell of an artist, baby.

translation.en: Come on, Feef!
translation.zh: 来 吧   菲菲

translation.en: Come on, Feef, go pee.

translation.en: Oh, shit! Snake! Feef! Come on, Feef! -[Fifi whimpering] -Run, Fifi!

translation.en: -[Fifi whimpering] -Run, Fifi! [RJ] Run! Come on!

translation.en: -[grunting] Come on! Hey! Lucinda... -Hey, what's the matter?
translation.zh: - 等等   露辛达   - 怎么 了 ？

translation.en: Don't go down there. Fifi's cornered by this big-ass poisonous snake.

translation.en: -And you left her? -No! Lucinda! Save yourself!

translation.en: -[Lucinda screaming] -Oh! You see? I'm sorry, Fifi!

translation.en: I ain't sucking out no... No poison!

translation.en: You okay, girl? Yeah? You just got a little scare, huh?

translation.en: [chuckles] Fifi...
translation.zh: 菲菲

translation.en: It's okay. It's all right.
translation.zh: 没事 的   没关系 的

translation.en: -She all right? -Yeah.
translation.zh: - 她 没事 吧 ？   - 是

translation.en: -Oh. -Here you go. -See? It was just a little milk snake. -Ah!
translation.zh: 给 你   看看   就是 条 小奶 蛇

translation.en: [sighs] Now, that wasn't the snake I saw.

translation.en: -It was an anaconda or a python. -Well, we don't have those down here.
translation.zh: 那 是 条水蟒 或 巨蟒   但 我们 这儿 没有 那种 蛇

translation.en: -For real? -Uh-huh.
translation.zh: 真的 吗 ？

translation.en: There you go.
translation.zh: 走 吧

translation.en: [sighs] You want to take a walk?

translation.en: Sure.
translation.zh: 当然

translation.en: [RJ] You out here running off that red velvet cake, huh?

translation.en: -[Lucinda] I deserve some cake. -[RJ] Yeah, no...

translation.en: [RJ] Oh, come on, you heard the stories. Hell, you witnessed a bunch.

translation.en: Everybody did everything better than me.

translation.en: So, I found something I'm good at.

translation.en: I get in front of that audience and they feel me.

translation.en: More than anyone here ever did.

translation.en: Please, Roscoe. What family doesn't mess with one another?

translation.en: I mean, I got teased to no end about my skinny legs.

translation.en: Yeah, well, you do have some slim-jims.

translation.en: Shut up! You could pick your teeth with those legs.

translation.en: -[RJ chuckles] -[laughs] Shut up.

translation.en: See? You can dish it out, boy. Especially when it comes to Clyde.

translation.en: Clyde. [scoffs]
translation.zh: 克莱德

translation.en: Clyde's big-headed ass needs to be knocked off his high horse sometimes.
translation.zh: 克莱德 就是 个 自大狂   有时候 得 被 教训 一下

translation.en: Why are you two always digging at each other?

translation.en: Because Clyde is dirty, and will use any underhanded trick to win.

translation.en: Aren't you exaggerating just a little?

translation.en: Uh, no.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: And what was all that "you stole what was mine" business? -Mm? -At the picnic. What did he steal?

translation.en: -Mm? -At the picnic. What did he steal?

translation.en: A great opportunity.

translation.en: Well, if it was that great, why can't you create another one?

translation.en: Maybe I will.

translation.en: Maybe you should.

translation.en: Caught you, didn't I? Mamma gonna get ya. Uh-huh.

translation.en: [Reggie] This raises some eyebrows.

translation.en: Well, sing like a canary, Reggie. Whistle.

translation.en: Well, sing like a canary, Reggie. Whistle. [sings] All that with the birds.

translation.en: [sings] All that with the birds. Harmonize with 'em. But you're not getting the plasma.

translation.en: Harmonize with 'em. But you're not getting the plasma.

translation.en: I was walking the dog.
translation.zh: 我 在 遛狗

translation.en: How's that? Bucky's with us.

translation.en: -I'm talking about Fiona. Where is Feef? -Oh, I think she's down by the gully.
translation.zh: 我 说 的 是 菲欧娜   菲菲 跑 哪 去 了 ？   她 好像 顺着 河沟 跑 下去 了

translation.en: -Where's Bucky? -Down by the gully.
translation.zh: 布基 在 哪儿 ？   顺着 河沟 跑 下去 了

translation.en: -[Reggie] He's gonna tear it up. -[Bucky howling]
translation.zh: 他 会 把 她 撕碎 的

translation.en: -Bucky, get your ass off! -[thuds]

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 天 啊

translation.en: -She is so working him. -[Fifi yelping]
translation.zh: 是 她 在 主动 啊

translation.en: Don't be surprised if he starts barking in tongues.

translation.en: -[sighs] -Bucky done turned the bitch out.

translation.en: -Reggie, not a word. -I got you.

translation.en: Is that plasma TV under warranty?

translation.en: I'm a steel trap, player. That dog gonna need counseling.

translation.en: -You gonna be all right? -Maybe she won't notice.

translation.en: Oh, baby. [chuckles] Me and Fifi had so much fun out there, we completely lost track of time.
translation.zh: 宝贝   我 和 菲菲 玩 得 可 开心 了

translation.en: Me and Fifi had so much fun out there, we completely lost track of time.
translation.zh: 我 都 忘 了 时间 了

translation.en: Yeah... Daddy loves himself some Fifi. Isn't that right, Fifi?

translation.en: [RJ] Daddy loves his little Fifi! Yeah!

translation.en: [RJ] Daddy loves his little Fifi! Yeah! Oh, we was running all over the place, baby. [chuckles]

translation.en: Yeah, she may need a bath.
translation.zh: 她 需要 洗 个 澡

translation.en: She got dirty. Real dirty.
translation.zh: 她 把 自己 弄 得 很 脏   真的 很 脏

translation.en: Now see here, buster.
translation.zh: 看 这里   小鬼

translation.en: Your alliance is with me, not the prom queen.
translation.zh: 你 的 同盟者 是 我   不是 那个 舞会 皇后

translation.en: Oh, come on, baby. There's no other alliance. All right?

translation.en: Now, how about you show me that little project?

translation.en: -I shaved off my little project. -Why'd you do that?

translation.en: If I discover there's a mutiny afoot,

translation.en: I'm gonna shave off your little project. Understand?

translation.en: Damn!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: -Damn! -Damn!
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: [man on TV] One timer! Kaberle.
translation.zh: 时间 紧迫   卡博利

translation.en: -Goal! -[all laugh]
translation.zh: 进 了

translation.en: -Goal! -[all laugh] Dang, you got game, nephew. It's all right.
translation.zh: 你 挺 不错 啊   侄子   真 厉害

translation.en: Hey, Dad!
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: Roscoe Malley! What's up, man?
translation.zh: 罗斯科   你好 吗 ？

translation.en: So I heard you been running around with my girl again. Come on, man.
translation.zh: 我 听说 你 又 去 勾引 我 的 女人 了   来 吧   老兄

translation.en: Let's play the game. Me and Junior take on you and Jamaal.

translation.en: -Yeah. -I don't play children's games.

translation.en: Oh, is that right? Then what's your poison, brother? [chuckles]

translation.en: -[rattling] -[Clyde] Ya hear that, though. Huh? You like that, eh? Yeah, I've been dying to play a little click-clack.
translation.zh: 听到 了 吗 ？ 你 喜欢 这个   是 吗 ？

translation.en: You like that, eh? Yeah, I've been dying to play a little click-clack.
translation.zh: 我 一直 很 想 玩玩 骰子

translation.en: Sure you want to take it there, Clyde?
translation.zh: 你 真的 想 玩 这个 吗 ？ 克莱德

translation.en: Cause I don't play for fun.
translation.zh: 我 可不 只是 为了 好玩

translation.en: Ain't no fun losing money.
translation.zh: 输钱 就 不 好玩 了

translation.en: Then you're about to have a bad time.
translation.zh: 那 你 肯定 会 输 得 很 惨 的

translation.en: -[both exclaim] -Seven! Oh, that's gonna be all day right there!
translation.zh: 七点   真是 太 赞 了

translation.en: -[RJ] Can you handle it? -Money maker! Money maker! Daddy needs a new pair of gators.
translation.zh: - 赚钱 …   - 给 老爹 来 一对 鳄鱼

translation.en: Uh-uh. Watch this right there.
translation.zh: 看 这个

translation.en: Talking about shake 'em up, shake 'em up, wake 'em.
translation.zh: 摇 起来 … 打败 他

translation.en: -Oh! -Yeah, Dad!
translation.zh: 爸爸

translation.en: Daddy, yes!
translation.zh: 爸爸   是的

translation.en: You know what, man? I admire you.
translation.zh: 知道 吗 ？ 伙计   我 佩服 你

translation.en: -Yeah? -I admire you, Roscoe.
translation.zh: - 是 吗 ？   - 我 佩服 你   罗斯科

translation.en: I mean, do you still keep trying.
translation.zh: 你 屡败屡战

translation.en: You know, cause even when I lose, I win. -Ooh. -Ooh.
translation.zh: 因为 我 即使 输 了 这 一 局   我 还是 赢家

translation.en: Well, then this must feel like the championship,
translation.zh: 好 啊   那 这次 就是 锦标赛 了

translation.en: cause you're losing the grip. Bitch! [laughs]
translation.zh: 因为 你 要 输个 精光 了

translation.en: -Right there. Right there. -Come on, baby, eat for Mama.
translation.zh: - 这边   - 来 吧   宝贝   为 妈妈 吃 点

translation.en: Uh, Binata?
translation.zh: 布娜塔

translation.en: You're not listening. Now, I told you to take that dog out of my kitchen.
translation.zh: 你 根本 就 没 听   我 告诉 你 把 狗 弄到 厨房 外面 去

translation.en: It just ain't sanitary! What's wrong with people?
translation.zh: 太 不 卫生 了   大家 都 出 什么 毛病 了 ？

translation.en: Bringing damn dogs up in folks' kitchen? Don't make no damn sense.
translation.zh: 把 狗 都 带进 人们 的 厨房 了   讲 不 讲 道理 了 ？

translation.en: That ain't nothing, you ain't even slick with yours, so that's the problem.
translation.zh: 你 做 得 不 漂亮   这就 是 问题 所在

translation.en: Everybody see what you're doing, man. But she mine, bro.
translation.zh: 大家 都 知道 你 在 做 什么 了   可是 她 是 我 的   老兄

translation.en: -Yeah? -Well, you might want to tell her that,
translation.zh: 是 吗 ？ 你 自己 和 她 说 去 吧

translation.en: cause she's feeling a brother.
translation.zh: 她 只 把 你 当 哥哥

translation.en: Seven again! [laughs]
translation.zh: 又 是 七

translation.en: All right, grease is hot, I need that fish.

translation.en: Bam! Uno. You know what I'm saying? You make a move, I'm C-4, C-2...

translation.en: Bam! I sunk your battleship. You remember that, don't you?

translation.en: Is something wrong with my... My cakes?"

translation.en: You actually tase your kids?

translation.en: I say, "You gonna take out that trash now?" He just...

translation.en: For not taking out the trash?

translation.en: Forty five thousand volts right through his big-- [bleep]
translation.zh: 四万五千 伏   穿过 他 的 大 屁股

translation.en: -"Yes... Dad..." [babbles] -Yeah.
translation.zh: “ 好的   爸爸 ”

translation.en: -[cell phone ringing] -Hold it, hold up. Who is this?

translation.en: I ain't gotta... No, I'm on the show. Look at me. Look.

translation.en: Or rock-paper-scissors.

translation.en: Cause we can scratch out. We can... We could DJ scratch...

translation.en: and then I gets down in that water, 'Scoe, and I be too...

translation.en: Like if you... If there wasn't an audience out there,

translation.en: I would race you up and down the audience steps.

translation.en: We can go. You know we can go too.

translation.en: Take the half ounce money, flip the half ounce money.

translation.en: Now you ready for a ounce. You got a quarter ki now!

translation.en: Now everybody in the neighborhood got on new sneakers and walkie-talkies.
translation.zh: 现在 所有 的 邻居   都 有 新 的 球鞋 和 步话机

translation.en: Everybody is working for you, you doing your thing and everything.

translation.en: I hope the feds ain't watching this. I'll call you back.

translation.en: I am. I am afraid, okay? I'm... I'm... I'm afraid of being hurt,

translation.en: and I don't want to be hurt.

translation.en: You pursue unattainable men.
translation.zh: 你 总是 追求 得 不 到 的 男人

translation.en: -What? -You want men you can't have.
translation.zh: - 什么 ？   - 你 眼光 太 高 了

translation.en: Men I can't have?

translation.en: Listen here-- [bleep] okay? I can have any man I want, okay?

translation.en: Don't get me twisted, 'Scoe.

translation.en: I am pretty in the face and thick around the waist.

translation.en: You better ask somebody. I got sugar walls!

translation.en: This right here is sweet tea. Ain't that right, baby?

translation.en: Yo, ma.
translation.zh: 是 啊

translation.en: Yeah. I'm saying, Doc, the booty is illmatic!

translation.en: Well, that wasn't quite what a brother had in mind.

translation.en: But that's the thing about family.

translation.en: I saw someone move like they were from another planet.

translation.en: I couldn't keep my eyes away.

translation.en: When I was little, my mom took me to watch a jam session in the neighborhood.

translation.en: It started out small, but word spread.

translation.en: Soon, some of the best dancers around were showing up

translation.en: to compete in something they eventually called, "The Streets."

translation.en: It became the hub, and I got a front-row seat to history.

translation.en: I wanted to glide and spin and fly like they did.

translation.en: But it didn't come easy.

translation.en: "Don't give up, just be you, 'cause life's too short to be anybody else."

translation.en: And she was right.

translation.en: When I was 16, my mom got sick.

translation.en: Within a couple of months, she was gone.

translation.en: And everything changed,

translation.en: including The Streets.

translation.en: The notoriously elusive 410

translation.en: has claimed responsibility for this morning's attack

translation.en: and shut down the Charles Center Station over security concerns.

translation.en: Police have been tracking this troubling trend,

translation.en: and sources close to the investigation...

translation.en: Not so fast, Andie. Get in here. Andie! [laughs]

translation.en: We've got to talk.

translation.en: I can't believe you.

translation.en: It's all over the news.

translation.en: So don't stand here and lie to my face.

translation.en: It wasn't a big deal. You have no idea what you're talking about.

translation.en: You've got to take responsibility for your life, Andie.

translation.en: You can't follow the 410 forever.

translation.en: I'm putting my foot down.

translation.en: This has got to stop. Now.

translation.en: No!

translation.en: No, the 410 is the only family I have left.

translation.en: And who are you to tell me how to live my life?

translation.en: Your mother was my best friend!

translation.en: I told her that I would be your guardian.
translation.zh: 我 告诉 过 她 我 会 做 你 的 监护人

translation.en: I promised her that I would take care of you,
translation.zh: 我 向 她 保证 过 我 会 照顾 好 你

translation.en: so you wouldn't have to leave your life here.

translation.en: But you won't let me.

translation.en: Instead, you skip school.

translation.en: You're out all night.

translation.en: God only knows what you're doing.

translation.en: I can't do this.

translation.en: Your Aunt Alice and I have been talking.

translation.en: You can't live here anymore.

translation.en: You're sending me to Texas?

translation.en: Like I haven't lost enough already?

translation.en: You can't do this to me!

translation.en: Your mother never would've let you get away with half the things I have.

translation.en: No, you have no idea what my mother would have done.

translation.en: Felicia, where are you?

translation.en: I don't know what to do. I'm going crazy.

translation.en: I'm done with her.

translation.en: Please, I need a place to crash.

translation.en: I'm not staying there anymore.

translation.en: Okay, call me. I'm heading to the Dragon.

translation.zh: 大家 好   我 是 你们 的 DJ   Sand
