translation.en: -Is that what you think? -If you even look at her--
translation.zh: - 那 就是 你 的 打算 ？   - 要是 你 敢 盯 着 她 看 …

translation.en: What will you do? Jump me away?
translation.zh: 你 会 怎样 ？ 把 我 移到 别的 地方 ？

translation.en: Did you think you were the only one?
translation.zh: 你 以为 只有 你 会 ？

translation.en: You really have no idea, do you?
translation.zh: 你 是 真的 不 懂   对 吧 ？

translation.en: Did you think you could just go on a Roman holiday and they wouldn't notice?
translation.zh: 你 过 你 的 生活   你 以为 你 可以 来 个 罗马 假期   他们 却 不 会 注意 ？

translation.en: Just jump all over the place. Jump, jump, jump. And nothing will happen?
translation.zh: 到处 穿梭 移动   跳来 跳去   却 啥 事 都 不 会 发生 ？

translation.en: They've noticed.
translation.zh: 他们 已经 注意 到 了

translation.en: Not me. I already knew. I'm not talking about me, but them.
translation.zh: 不是 我   我 早就 知道 了   我 说 的 不是 我   是 他们

translation.en: Down there.
translation.zh: 在 那边

translation.en: Hello, boys.
translation.zh: 你们 好 啊

translation.en: Just me, then.
translation.zh: 看来 只有 我 了

translation.en: Ah...that's new.
translation.zh: 新 玩意

translation.en: Welcome to the war.
translation.zh: 欢迎 加入 战争

translation.en: Let me know if you get tired!
translation.zh: 你们 累 了 就 跟 我 说

translation.en: Close.
translation.zh: 差一点

translation.en: David?
translation.zh: 戴维 ？

translation.en: What's going on?
translation.zh: 怎么 回 事 ？

translation.en: Let's meet the girlfriend.
translation.zh: - 来去 见见 你 女朋友 吧 ！   - 不

translation.en: Who are these people?
translation.zh: 这些 人 是 谁 ？

translation.en: Paladins. Paladins kill jumpers. I kill Paladins. Class dismissed.
translation.zh: 圣 骑士   他们 追杀 移动 人   我 杀 他们   下课

translation.en: Wait!
translation.zh: 等等

translation.en: I came through your jump scar.
translation.zh: 我 随着 你 的 空间 裂痕 来 的

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你 来 这里 干嘛 ？

translation.en: If I were you, I'd jump back.
translation.zh: 如果 我 是 你   我 会 滚 回去

translation.en: You're not supposed to see this stuff.
translation.zh: 你 不 该 看到 这些 东西   不 应该 来到 这里   滚开

translation.en: So if you'd kindly fuck off... ...as in now, maybe your girlfriend's still alive.
translation.zh: 所以 如果 你 愿意 滚开

translation.en: ...as in now, maybe your girlfriend's still alive.
translation.zh: 也许 你 女朋友 还 活 着

translation.en: -What happened to you? -Nothing.
translation.zh: - 你 怎么 了 ？   - 没 什么

translation.en: Let's go. I think we should get out of here.
translation.zh: - 走 吧 ！   - 什么 ？   我 想 我们 该 离开 这里

translation.en: That didn't sound like nothing.
translation.zh: 那 听 起来 不 像 没 什么

translation.en: You were right. I shouldn't have gone down there.
translation.zh: 你 说 的 对   我 不 该 下去 的   - 戴维   - 没事 啦

translation.en: Come on. We can still make the museum.
translation.zh: 走 吧   去 博物馆 还 来得及

translation.en: Will you talk to me?
translation.zh: 你 跟 我 说话 好 吗 ？

translation.en: There must be a cab.
translation.zh: 应该 有 计程车 的

translation.en: Will you please just talk to me?
translation.zh: 拜托 你 跟 我 说话 好 吗 ？

translation.en: -I'll tell you back at the hotel. -I'm not waiting for the hotel.
translation.zh: 回 饭店 再说   我 不要 等到 那时候

translation.en: Millie, it's all fine, okay?
translation.zh: 米莉   没事   好 吗 ？

translation.en: -It's not fine. -I wasn't supposed to go back there.
translation.zh: - 才 怪   - 我 不 该 跑去 那 后面 的

translation.en: -I think you guys made a mistake. -Be quiet.
translation.zh: - 你们 弄错 了   - 保持 静默   你们 要 找 那边 那个 男的 吧 ？

translation.en: I know I wasn't supposed to be back there.
translation.zh: 我 知道 我们 不 该   对不起   我 知道 我 不 该 跑去 那 后面

translation.en: You're looking for that guy.
translation.zh: 你们 在 找 那 家伙

translation.en: Can you let us off with a warning? Okay, okay.
translation.zh: 告诫 我们 一下 就 好 了   好 吧

translation.en: Go back to the hotel.
translation.zh: - 回 饭店 去   - 不

translation.en: Yes, I'm with him. I'm with him!
translation.zh: - 不   我们 不是 一起 的   - 对   我 是 跟 他 一起 的

translation.en: I don't know her. Millie, go to the hotel.
translation.zh: 我 不 认识 她   米莉   回 饭店 去

translation.en: I told you... ...I want to see Millie.
translation.zh: 我 跟 你 说 过 了   我 想见 米 莉

translation.en: Where is the body?
translation.zh: 尸体 在 哪里 ？

translation.en: I didn't do anything. How many times do you want me to say that?
translation.zh: 我 什么 都 没 做   你 到底 要 我 说 多少 次 ？

translation.en: How much longer will he be?
translation.zh: 他 还要 待 多久 ？

translation.en: We wait for magistrato.
translation.zh: 我们 在 等 长官

translation.en: Yeah, I know. We've been waiting all night.
translation.zh: 我 知道   我们 已经 等 了 整个 晚上

translation.en: -I don't know what you said. -Sit or we seat you.
translation.zh: 我 听 不 懂 你 说 什么   坐下   不然 我们 就 动手 让 你 坐下

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好 吧

translation.en: -Sit! -I sit.
translation.zh: - 坐下   - 我 坐下 了

translation.en: She has nothing to do with this.
translation.zh: 她 跟 这一切 毫无 关系

translation.en: The magistrate is here. We will keep your passport.
translation.zh: 长官 到 了   我们 要 扣留 你 的 护照

translation.en: Don't worry, you don't need it where you're going.
translation.zh: 别 担心   你 要 去 的 地方 不 需要 它

translation.en: Hello, David.
translation.zh: 你好   戴维

translation.en: You've only got 30 seconds before they come through that door. You have to go.
translation.zh: 在 他们 进来 前   你 只有 30秒   明白 吗 ？   你 得 离开

translation.en: Ditch the girl. If she's with you, she's dead.
translation.zh: 甩掉 那 女孩   她 跟着 你 死定 了

translation.en: Ditch the girl. If she's with you, she's dead. Mom!
translation.zh: 妈 ！

translation.en: Twenty seconds, David.
translation.zh: 20 秒   戴维

translation.en: Mom! Mom!
translation.zh: 妈 ！

translation.en: Millie.
translation.zh: 米莉

translation.en: All done. Are you okay?
translation.zh: - 都 搞定 了   你 没事 吧 ？   - 没事

translation.en: -We're free to walk. -They let you go?
translation.zh: - 我们 可以 走 了   - 他们 放 你 走 ？

translation.en: They let me go.
translation.zh: 他们 放 我 走

translation.en: -Just like that. -Just like that.
translation.zh: - 就 这样 ？   - 就 这样

translation.en: If they let you go, then why are we running?
translation.zh: 若 他们 放 你 走   我们 干嘛 要 跑 ？

translation.en: They strongly suggested we leave town now.
translation.zh: 他们 强烈 建议 我们 马上 离开

translation.en: -What did they say to you? -Just asked questions.
translation.zh: - 他们 对 你 说 了 什么 ？   - 就 问 了 一些 问题

translation.en: For eight hours?
translation.zh: 问 了 八 小时 ？

translation.en: They had a lot of questions.
translation.zh: 他们 有 很多 问题

translation.en: I really want to trust you, but--
translation.zh: 我 真的 很 想 相信 你   可是 …

translation.en: So trust me. Let's go.
translation.zh: 那 就 相信 我   走 吧

translation.en: Hey, can you take us?
translation.zh: 你 能 载 我们 吗 ？

translation.en: Get in the cab, Millie.
translation.zh: 上车   米莉

translation.en: Millie, get in the car.
translation.zh: 米莉   快 上车

translation.en: Please, please get in the cab.
translation.zh: 拜托 你 上车

translation.en: That's yours.
translation.zh: 那 是 你 的

translation.en: Remember how I told you didn't need to tell me everything?
translation.zh: 记得 我 说 过 你 不用 什么 都 告诉 我 吧 ？

translation.en: I changed my mind.
translation.zh: 我 改变 主意 了

translation.en: What's in the backpack?
translation.zh: 你 背包 里 装 了 什么 ？

translation.en: Where did you get that?
translation.zh: 那些 是 从 哪 弄 来 的 ？

translation.en: I don't want to lie.
translation.zh: 我 不 想 说谎

translation.en: But you don't want to tell the truth, either.
translation.zh: 不过 你 也 不 想 告诉 我 实话

translation.en: I can't get on this flight with you. This is as far as we go together.
translation.zh: 我 不 能 跟 你 一起 搭 这 班 飞机   我们 最 远 只能 一起 到 这里

translation.en: To Detroit?
translation.zh: 去 底特律 ？

translation.en: Roland. We lost him, sir.
translation.zh: - 我 是 罗兰   - 我们 追丢 他 了

translation.en: -How many did you send? -Two.
translation.zh: - 你们 派 了 几 个人 ？   - 两 个

translation.en: I said to send everyone.
translation.zh: 我 说 过 要 全体 出动 的

translation.en: She said two was enough. But they missed him.
translation.zh: 她 说 两 个 就 够 了   但 他们 搞砸 了

translation.en: It's like he knew we were coming.
translation.zh: 他 似乎 知道 我们 会 出现

translation.en: We're searching the grid now.
translation.zh: 我们 正在 进行 彻底 搜寻

translation.en: Keep me informed. I'm taking a different tack.
translation.zh: 有 消息 随时 通知   我 要 试试 别的 方法

translation.en: William Rice?
translation.zh: - 威廉莱斯 ？   - 对

translation.en: IRS.
translation.zh: 国税局

translation.en: Could we... ...go inside and talk?
translation.zh: 我 能 不 能 进去 谈 ？

translation.en: I don't have to ask. That's a courtesy.
translation.zh: 我 其实 不用 问   那 只是 礼貌

translation.en: So what's this about?
translation.zh: 请问 有 何 贵干 ？

translation.en: Your son, David.
translation.zh: 你 儿子   戴维

translation.en: Why? Is he in some kind of trouble?
translation.zh: 怎么 ？ 他 惹上 什么 麻烦 了 ？

translation.en: This will go a lot swifter if you let me ask the questions.
translation.zh: 这 场 谈话 由 我 发问 会 比较 快 一点

translation.en: When's the last time you saw your son?
translation.zh: 你 最后 一 次 看到 你 儿子 是 何时 ？

translation.en: Eight years ago.
translation.zh: 八 年前

translation.en: -Eight years? -That's right.
translation.zh: 八 年 ？   对

translation.en: What about friends?
translation.zh: 那 他 的 朋友 呢 ？

translation.en: -Anybody I can talk to? -He didn't have a lot of friends.
translation.zh: - 我 能 找 谁 谈谈 吗 ？   - 他 并没有 太 多 朋友

translation.en: I'd like to talk to David's mother.
translation.zh: 我 想 跟 戴维 的 母亲 谈谈

translation.en: Me, too. If you find her, tell her I said hello.
translation.zh: 我 也 想   你 若 找到 她   请代 我 问候 一 声

translation.en: Is that her?
translation.zh: 那 是 她 吗 ？

translation.en: Mary Rice was her name back then.
translation.zh: 她 当时 的 名字 叫 玛丽莱斯

translation.en: When's the last time you saw her?
translation.zh: 你 上 一 次 看到 她 是 何时 ？

translation.en: -She split when the kid turned five. -Five.
translation.zh: 孩子 五 岁 时   她 就 离开 了   五 岁

translation.en: Haven't heard a word since.
translation.zh: 之后 就 音讯 全 无

translation.en: If I hear anything, I'll be sure to give you a holler.
translation.zh: 若 我 有 任何 消息   一定 会 通知 你

translation.en: No, you won't.
translation.zh: 不   你 不 会

translation.en: No, I won't.
translation.zh: 对   我 不 会

translation.en: Have you seen this new thing?
translation.zh: 你 看 过 这个 新 玩意 吗 ？

translation.en: It's a new control. If you just double click....
translation.zh: 全新 的 控制器   只要 按 两 下 …

translation.en: See that? It's pretty.
translation.zh: 看到 没 ？ 太 赞 了

translation.en: Still alive, are you?
translation.zh: 你 还 没 死 吗 ？

translation.en: He's dead! What?! That's just great.
translation.zh: - 他 死 了 ！   - 什么 ？ 这下 好 了

translation.en: -There's more of them? -Hundreds more.
translation.zh: - 他们 有 很多 人 吗 ？   - 数百 人

translation.en: -There's more of them? -Hundreds more. I'm tracking ten right now. What do you care?
translation.zh: 我 正在 追 其中 十 个   关 你 什么 事 ？   还有 很多 人

translation.en: -What about the rest? -What about them?
translation.zh: - 其他人 呢 ？   - 其他人 怎样 ？

translation.en: Like I said, I hunt them.
translation.zh: 我 说 过   我 猎杀 他们

translation.en: -Who are these guys? -I told you, Paladins.
translation.zh: - 这些 人 是 谁 ？   - 我 说 过 了   圣骑士

translation.en: You told me their name but not what they want.
translation.zh: 你 只 说 过 他们 叫 什么   却 没 说 他们 要 什么

translation.en: Simple. They want us dead. Didn't you figure that out?
translation.zh: 简单   他们 要 我们 死   你 还 没 搞 清楚 啊 ？

translation.en: -I got that much. -Good. Do you mind just, uh...?
translation.zh: 这 我 很 清楚   - 很 好   你 能 不 能 …   - 谢 了

translation.en: -Why? -Because we do whatever we want.
translation.zh: 为什么 ？   因为 我们 为所欲为

translation.en: Now can you...?
translation.zh: 现在 你 能 不 能 …

translation.en: -He's dead. -Great.
translation.zh: - 他 死 了   - 真 好

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢 了

translation.en: You really don't get it.
translation.zh: 你 真的 不 明白 ？

translation.en: Paladins have been killing jumpers for years, since medieval times.
translation.zh: 圣骑士 追杀 移动 人 多年   早 从 中世纪 就 开始

translation.en: They're fanatics, religious nut jobs.
translation.zh: 他们 是 宗教 狂热 份子

translation.en: The Inquisition, witch hunts, that was them.
translation.zh: 降魔 抓妖处 死异教徒 的 就是 他们

translation.en: They're smart... ...fast and organized. They'll kill anyone who gets in their way...
translation.zh: 他们 很 聪明   行动 敏捷 又 有 组织

translation.en: ...fast and organized. They'll kill anyone who gets in their way...
translation.zh: 他们 会 杀 了 所有 挡路 的 人

translation.en: ...like your family, your friends...
translation.zh: 像是 你 的 家人   你 的 朋友

translation.en: ...that little girlfriend you had traipsing around Rome.
translation.zh: 在 罗马 跟 你 一起 闲逛 的 女朋友

translation.en: They're dead. All of them.
translation.zh: 他们 死定 了   全都 是

translation.en: Get used to it. It's a matter of time.
translation.zh: 习惯 吧   这 只是 早晚 的 问题

translation.en: I'm getting take-away. Want some?
translation.zh: 我 要 买 吃 的   要 吃 一点 吗 ？

translation.en: Somebody get some help!
translation.zh: 快来人 帮忙 啊

translation.en: Now!
translation.zh: 快点

translation.en: -What happened? -What's going on?
translation.zh: - 怎么 了 ？   - 怎么 回 事 ？   推轮 椅 过来 ！

translation.en: Let me look. Get the paddles!
translation.zh: 让 我 看看   快 拿 电击器 来

translation.en: He smashed through the glass in the other room?
translation.zh: 他 撞破 玻璃 冲 进来 ？

translation.en: Are you okay? Stay still.
translation.zh: 你 没事 吧 ？ 别 乱动

translation.en: How is he?
translation.zh: 他 怎么样 ？

translation.en: -I'm not getting a pulse. -Defib!
translation.zh: - 我 没 测到 脉搏   - 电击

translation.en: What the hell happened here?
translation.zh: 这里 到底 是 怎么 回 事 ？

translation.en: -Mark. -Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: - 马克   - 老天爷

translation.en: What did you tell him? How did they know about Ann Arbor?
translation.zh: 你 说 了 什么 ？   - 别 碰 我   - 他们 怎么 知道 我家 ？

translation.en: Stay away from me!
translation.zh: - 别 靠近 我   - 你 对 谁 说 了 ？ 是 谁 ？

translation.en: Was it a black guy, white hair? Was his name Roland?
translation.zh: 是 不是 一个 满头白发 的 黑人 ？   他 是 不是 叫 罗兰 ？

translation.en: Just answer the question, or... ...I'll drop you off Mount Everest.
translation.zh: 快点 回答   不然 我 就 把 你 扔到 圣母 峰顶

translation.en: -What did you tell him?! -What?! Tell what?!
translation.zh: - 什么 ？ 我 没 …   - 你 跟 他 说 了 什么 ？   什么 ？ 说 什么 ？

translation.en: I know you told him about Ann Arbor. Did you tell him about Millie?
translation.zh: 我 知道 你 跟 他 提到 我家   提到 安阿伯

translation.en: I know you told him about Ann Arbor. Did you tell him about Millie? -I told him everything. -Why did you do that?!
translation.zh: - 你 也 说 了 米莉 的 事 ？   - 我 什么 都 说 了

translation.en: -I told him everything. -Why did you do that?!
translation.zh: 你 为什么 要 这样 ？

translation.en: -Why not? -God!
translation.zh: - 为什么 不行 ？   - 天哪 ！

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: 你 到底 是 谁 ？

translation.en: Where'd the Paladin go?
translation.zh: 圣骑士 跑 哪 去 了 ？

translation.en: -Swimming. -Pacific?
translation.zh: - 在 游泳   - 太平洋 ？

translation.en: No, Atlantic. A nice little shark pit around Cuba.
translation.zh: 大西洋   古巴 附近 的 鲨鱼 海域

translation.en: What are you doing? Put that back.
translation.zh: 你 干嘛 ？ 快 把 东西 放 回去

translation.en: -I need to borrow this. -Just stay away from the wall!
translation.zh: 我 要 借用 这些   别 靠近 这 面 墙

translation.en: I'll cut your eyes out!
translation.zh: 我 要 挖 了 你 的 眼睛

translation.en: -I need to find Roland. -No, you don't!
translation.zh: - 我 要 找到 罗兰   - 不 可能 的

translation.en: I only got 8 hours.
translation.zh: - 我 只有 八 小时   - 八 小时 ？

translation.en: -Her flight lands in 8 hours. -That stuff won't help. It's 4 years old.
translation.zh: 她 的 班机 八 小时 后 就 降落 了   那些 没用   是 四 年前 的 旧 东西

translation.en: Shall I jump you back to high school, so you can learn something?
translation.zh: 我 是 不是 该 把 你 扔回 高中 时代   好 让 你 学点 什么 ？

translation.en: Shall I jump you back to high school, so you can learn something? Look.
translation.zh: 我 追 了 他 十 年 了   你 看 这个

translation.en: See this? Our first round in Nepal.
translation.zh: 看见 没 ？ 我们 在 尼泊尔 的 第一 战

translation.en: You should see the one he gave me in Prague.
translation.zh: 你 该 看看 他 在 布拉格送 我 的 礼物

translation.en: Forget it. Forget Roland.
translation.zh: 算了 吧   忘 了 罗兰

translation.en: Don't waste your time. Just leave it to me.
translation.zh: 别 浪费 你 的 时间   把 一切 交给 我 吧

translation.en: You mind?
translation.zh: - 拜托 ？   - 喂

translation.en: A little privacy? This is my thing.
translation.zh: 尊重 一下 吧 ？ 这是 我 的 东西

translation.en: Just, you know, turn around.
translation.zh: 拜托   转过身 去

translation.en: I was thinking that if we do this together...
translation.zh: 我 在 想 如果 我们 联手

translation.en: ...we could get him.
translation.zh: 就 可以 打垮 他

translation.en: You mean like you and me?
translation.zh: - 你 是 说 就 你 跟 我 ？   - 对

translation.en: Like we team up.
translation.zh: - 组成 双人组 ？   - 对

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, but I don't play well with others.
translation.zh: 抱歉   我 习惯 单打独斗

translation.en: Do me a favor.
translation.zh: 帮 个 忙

translation.en: Don't be here when I get back. Find a rock, crawl under it, stay there.
translation.zh: 我 回来 时 不 想 看到 你   去 找 个 石头   躲到 下面 去

translation.en: Joi wooi, brother.

translation.en: Yes, it's true.

translation.en: You were five years old, your first jump. I had two choices:

translation.en: Kill you or leave you.

translation.en: So you left.

translation.en: To protect you.

translation.en: I was five.

translation.en: I did what I had to do.

translation.en: I've never stopped thinking about you, not even for one day.

translation.en: What now?

translation.en: Because I love you.

translation.en: Good luck.

translation.en: -You okay? -Yeah.

translation.en: You sure?

translation.en: Yeah, I am.

translation.en: You're really something.

translation.en: Really?

translation.en: that my boyfriend would say.

translation.en: You know me.

translation.en: I mean what I say.

translation.en: You're just saying that

translation.en: because I'm drunk and you're drunk.

translation.en: How many times do I have to tell you?

translation.en: You're kind, intelligent, and beautiful.

translation.en: Who wouldn't fall for you?

translation.en: I'm drunk. This is so embarrassing.

translation.en: More like hilarious.

translation.en: You know I love Basha.

translation.en: But you said you weren't happy with him anymore.

translation.en: Yes! That's why we're here. That's why I got us a room.

translation.en: I never said I wanted to have sex with you.

translation.zh: 小莎   我们 都会 累

translation.en: I get tired from working too.
translation.zh: 工作 也 让 我 很 疲惫

translation.en: But, we have to focus.
translation.zh: 但 我们 必须 专注

translation.en: You have to keep your eyes on the goal.
translation.zh: 必须 将 双眼 定准 前方 的 目标

translation.en: Poy, you don't understand.
translation.zh: 阿波   你 不 明白

translation.en: That's not the problem.
translation.zh: 这不 是 我 的 问题

translation.en: -It's just-- -Wait, it's my boss calling.
translation.zh: - 只是 …   - 等等   老板 打 来 了

translation.en: Sir, yes, I'm on my way.
translation.zh: 老板   是   我 在 路上 了

translation.en: Yes, sir, really on the way.
translation.zh: 是的   真的 在 路上 了

translation.en: Bash, I love you, you love me.
translation.zh: 小莎   我 爱 你 、 你 也 爱 我

translation.en: What's the problem? Nothing, right?
translation.zh: 还有 什么 问题 ？ 没事 对 不对 ？

translation.en: Go on, go inside.
translation.zh: 好 了   快进屋 吧

translation.en: Wake up, sleepyhead.
translation.zh: 懒惰 虫   快 起床

translation.en: You can't be late.
translation.zh: 你 可不 能 迟到

translation.en: It's train day today.
translation.zh: 今天 你 要 自己 搭 地铁

translation.en: -We'll go by Helen's too. -Okay.
translation.zh: 我们 还 得 去 接 海伦

translation.en: We don't want her to be late for her flight.
translation.zh: 千万 不 能 害 她 错过 班机

translation.en: You have to be in the office by 8:30, too.
translation.zh: 你 也 得 在 八点半 前 上班

translation.en: Come on, wake up, or you'll be late again.
translation.zh: 快点 起床   不然 你 又 要 迟到 了

translation.en: Can I stay home from work today?
translation.zh: 我 今天 可不可以 请假 ？

translation.en: -Why? Are you sick? -No. It's just that…
translation.zh: - 为什么 ？ 你 生病 了 吗 ？   - 不   只是 …

translation.en: -about last night… I was saying… -Oh, that thing…
translation.zh: - 昨晚 … 我 想 说 的 是 …   - 那个 呀

translation.en: Basha, you can't miss work today.
translation.zh: 巴莎   今天 不 能 请假

translation.en: Your presentation is today, right?
translation.zh: 你 今天 要 报告   不是 吗 ？

translation.en: You know how temperamental your boss is.
translation.zh: 你 也 知道 老板 脾气 不 好

translation.en: Do you want to get fired or something?
translation.zh: 难道 你 想 被 炒鱿鱼 ？

translation.en: OK, I'm going to work.
translation.zh: 好 吧   我 会 去 上班

translation.en: Come on, get up.
translation.zh: 快点 起床

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我 爱 你

translation.en: Smells good.
translation.zh: 好香 呀

translation.en: Isn't my baby just the sweetest?
translation.zh: 我 的 女友 最 棒 了 对 不对 ？

translation.en: That's why I keep telling you to buy her a ring already
translation.zh: 所以 我 才 一直 叫 你 快 去 买 个 戒指

translation.en: before she realizes that she doesn't want to marry you next year, or ever.
translation.zh: 免得 她 明年 或 以后 变卦 不 想 嫁给 你

translation.en: Do you?
translation.zh: 你 会 这样 吗 ？

translation.en: Do you still need one, Bash?
translation.zh: 小 莎   你 真的 想要 戒指 ？

translation.en: She doesn't need one because I'm too perfect.
translation.zh: 她 不用 戒指   因为 我 太 完美 了

translation.en: You're so sure of yourself, aren't you? Poy, please.
translation.zh: 拜托   你 也 对 自己 太 有 信心 了 吧

translation.en: He's not going to buy me a ring because it's too expensive.
translation.zh: 他 不 愿意 买 戒指 给 我   因为 太 贵 了

translation.en: That's why you should have taken that job in Qatar,
translation.zh: 所以 我 才 叫 你 接下 那 份 卡达 的 工作

translation.en: so you could have bought Basha a proper engagement ring.
translation.zh: 这样 就 能 买 个 好戒 指向 巴莎 求婚 了

translation.en: Time to go. Let's go, Bash.
translation.zh: 该 走 了   小莎   走 吧

translation.en: Take care of yourself, OK?
translation.zh: 好好 照顾 自己   懂 吗 ？

translation.en: And call me when you can.
translation.zh: 到家 时 打 给 我

translation.en: Why didn't you take the train?
translation.zh: 你 怎么 没 搭 地铁 ？

translation.en: Because, if I did, I wouldn't have been able to follow your schedule.
translation.zh: 因为 如果 我 搭 地铁   就 赶 不 上 你 紧凑 的 计划 了

translation.en: I shouldn't have brought my pickup, then.
translation.zh: 那 我 真 不 该 开 货车 过来

translation.en: We're wasting gas. Why didn't you tell me earlier?
translation.zh: 真是 浪费 油   你 怎么 不 告诉 我 ？

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me about this offer from Qatar?
translation.zh: 你 怎么 没 说 自己 有 机会 去 卡达 工作 ？

translation.en: Bash… Because I have no plans of working there.
translation.zh: 小莎   因为 我 一点 也 不 想 去 那里 工作

translation.en: Bash, do I really have to go abroad to earn money?
translation.zh: 小莎   我 一定 得到 国外 工作 赚钱 吗 ？

translation.en: -Besides, we both have jobs here anyway-- -What if I resign?
translation.zh: - 再说   我们 在 这里 都 有 工作   - 如果 我 辞职 呢 ？

translation.en: There you go again, Bash.
translation.zh: 小莎   你 又 在 胡说 了

translation.en: What are you going to do?
translation.zh: 那 你 以后 要 做 什么 ？

translation.en: You're going to waste your college degree just making T-shirts?
translation.zh: 把 大学 学历 浪费 在 绘制 T恤 上 ？

translation.en: At least they're my own designs.
translation.zh: 至少 那 是 我 的 原创 设计

translation.en: Bash, we're getting married next year.
translation.zh: 小莎   我们 明年 就要 结婚 了

translation.en: You think raising a family is easy?
translation.zh: 你 以为 养家 很 容易 吗 ？

translation.en: You can't resign.
translation.zh: 你 不 能 辞职

translation.en: So I can't make decisions about your job,
translation.zh: 我 不 能 为 你 的 工作 出 意见

translation.en: but you can make decisions about mine?
translation.zh: 你 却 能 为 我 的 工作 做 决定 ？

translation.en: Bash… come on.
translation.zh: 小莎   别 这样

translation.en: Bash, the boss has been looking for you.
translation.zh: 小莎   老板 在 找 你

translation.en: He's fuming mad already.
translation.zh: 他 已经 气到 暴跳如雷 了

translation.en: What's that about?
translation.zh: 怎么 回 事 ？

translation.en: How many times do I have to tell you, you're not supposed to think.
translation.zh: 告诉 过 你 多少 次 了   不要 有 自己 的 想法

translation.en: I'm the boss, you're not.
translation.zh: 我 是 老板   你 只是 员工

translation.en: All you needed to do was copy the plan, but you couldn't even do that!
translation.zh: 你 只要 复制 设计 图 就 好   怎么 连 这点 都 做 不 到 ？

translation.en: Don't think you're smarter than me.
translation.zh: 别自 以为 比 我 聪明

translation.en: I told you, I don't want the gazebo to appear in the middle of the pool
translation.zh: 我 告诉 过 你

translation.en: I told you, I don't want the gazebo to appear in the middle of the pool in the model scale.
translation.zh: 我 不要 在 比例 模型 上   看到 泳池 中央 有露台

translation.en: Here! Tell me you revised the scale model
translation.zh: 告诉 我 ！ 你 到底 有 没有 看 过

translation.en: we're going to present later already.
translation.zh: 我们 等 一下 要 报告 的 比例 模型 ？

translation.en: If I get humiliated later,
translation.zh: 要是 等 一下 害 我 丢脸   你 就 等 着 走路

translation.en: -Poy, let's go. -Straighten out your plan, Basha.
translation.zh: - 阿波   走 吧   - 巴莎   你 自己 好好 想想 吧

translation.en: If you want to stay in this business,
translation.zh: 如果 你 还 想 在 这个 产业 混 下去

translation.en: He wants to fire me? Fine.
translation.zh: 他 想 炒 我 鱿鱼 ？ 好 啊 ！

translation.en: I'll be happy to go! This job is fit for a stupid moron anyway.
translation.zh: 我 可求 之 不得   反正 这 份 工作   只 适合 不 懂 动脑 的 呆头 鹅

translation.en: Can't he see why I keep changing his plans?
translation.zh: 他 不 懂 我 为什么 一直 修改 设计 图 吗 ？

translation.en: Has he even heard of the word "aesthetics?"
translation.zh: 因为 他 根本 不 知道 美学 两 个 字 怎么 写

translation.en: Why don't you just resign, then?
translation.zh: 那 你 怎么 不 干脆 辞职 算了 ？

translation.en: Then she'll get in trouble with Popoy.
translation.zh: 因为 这样 波普 会生 她 的 气

translation.en: Poor Basha…
translation.zh: 可怜 的 巴莎

translation.en: That's Popoy calling.
translation.zh: 波普 打 来 了

translation.en: Bash, have you changed the plans yet?
translation.zh: 小莎   设计 图 改 好 了 吗 ？

translation.en: -Poy, I don't want to-- -Basha, stop being so stubborn.
translation.zh: - 阿波   我 不 想 改   - 巴莎   别 这么 顽固

translation.en: Basha, your job is very easy.
translation.zh: 巴莎   你 的 工作 很 简单

translation.en: All you needed to do was copy the plan,
translation.zh: 只要 复制 设计 图 就 好

translation.en: -but you couldn't even do that. -We still need to find it.
translation.zh: 怎么 连 这点 小事 都 做 不 到 ？

translation.en: Aw, poor kid. She has two bosses.
translation.zh: 可怜 的 孩子   被 两 个 老板 管

translation.en: Everything OK now?
translation.zh: 没 问题 吧 ？

translation.en: I don't think she wants to change it.
translation.zh: 她 好像 不 想 改图

translation.en: Sir.
translation.zh: 先生

translation.en: -Hello? Jethro, man, sorry to disturb you. -Sir.
translation.zh: 杰斯洛   抱歉 打扰 你

translation.en: Have you talked to Basha yet?
translation.zh: 你 跟 巴莎 谈 过 了 吗 ？

translation.en: Yes, she called me a while ago. She already revised the model.
translation.zh: 对   刚刚 她 打 给 我   她 把 模型 改 好 了

translation.en: Dude. What she said was wrong.
translation.zh: 老兄   别 听 她 胡说

translation.en: The model needs to be reset to the original plan.
translation.zh: 模型 必须 改成 原本 设计 图 的 样子

translation.en: -Sir, it's OK now, sir. -Jethro, thank you very much.
translation.zh: - 老兄   没 问题 了   - 杰斯洛   谢谢 你

translation.en: OK, sir.
translation.zh: 没 问题

translation.en: so that visitors will enjoy the viewing deck more.
translation.zh: 这样 访客 就 能 享有 绝佳 的 瞭望 台景 致

translation.en: It's a good thing we got that model fixed
translation.zh: 还 好 模型 改 好 了

translation.en: -or we would both be in trouble. -I would be in trouble.
translation.zh: - 否则 我们 俩 都会 完蛋   - 会 完蛋 的 人 只有 我

translation.en: You think I'd ever let that happen?
translation.zh: 你 以为 我 会 坐视不管 ？

translation.en: Don't let your emotions rule you. You'll end up hurt that way.
translation.zh: 别 被 情绪 支配 了   否则 你 会 受伤 的

translation.en: Then you'll complain that you're tired of it.
translation.zh: 然后 你 就 会 抱怨 自己 觉得 好 累

translation.en: Don't forget your 7 p.m. deadline.
translation.zh: 别 忘 了   傍晚 七点 前 要 交件

translation.en: We don't want to be late for dinner at Kenneth's…
translation.zh: 今晚 在 肯尼斯家 的 聚餐 别迟 到

translation.en: Bash.
translation.zh: 小莎

translation.en: Just this once.
translation.zh: 这 一 次 就 好

translation.en: You know that's bad for you. It's high in cholesterol.
translation.zh: 你 明 知道 这 对 身体 不 好   胆固醇 很 高

translation.en: Poy, just this once.
translation.zh: 阿波   这 一 次 就 好

translation.en: -What's wrong with you? -Here.
translation.zh: - 你 是 怎么 了 ？   - 拿 去

translation.en: What's your problem?
translation.zh: - 你 是 怎么 搞 的 ？   - 我 要 一点 空间

translation.en: There. Space.
translation.zh: 喏   有 空间 了

translation.en: Eat.
translation.zh: 吃 吧

translation.en: Lover's quarrel.
translation.zh: 只是 情侣 吵架

translation.en: Anj, stop messing with the food. It'll taste like instant noodles again.
translation.zh: 安吉   别 玩 食物   不然 又 会 尝 起来 像 泡面

translation.en: Then don't eat it.
translation.zh: 那 就 别 吃 呀

translation.en: Poy, I thought everything was OK. Where's Basha?
translation.zh: 阿波   我 以为 你们 和好 了   巴莎 呢 ？

translation.en: At work. She's finishing something.
translation.zh: 还 在 公司 加班 赶工

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么 ？

translation.en: OK, I'm on my way.
translation.zh: 好   我 立刻 过去

translation.en: Basha's car broke down.
translation.zh: 巴莎 的 车抛 锚 了

translation.en: She asked me to pick her up.
translation.zh: 她 叫 我 过去 接 她

translation.en: Why didn't she call you?
translation.zh: 她 怎么 没 打 给 你 ？

translation.en: Maybe she's with another dude and doesn't want to get caught.
translation.zh: 可能 她 跟 别的 男人 在一起   不 想 被 抓奸 在 床 吧

translation.en: Shut up.
translation.zh: 别 说 了

translation.en: Are you OK?
translation.zh: 你 没事 吧 ？

translation.en: Why are you here?
translation.zh: 你 怎么 来 了 ？

translation.en: Because I'm your boyfriend.
translation.zh: 我 可是 你 的 男朋友

translation.en: What did I tell you?
translation.zh: 我 就 说 吧 ？

translation.en: If you hadn't driven your car, we wouldn't be here--
translation.zh: 如果 你 没 开车   我们 也 不 会 落到 如此 田地 …

translation.en: -Poy I can do this. -Why did you call Anj anyway?
translation.zh: - 阿波   我 自己 来   - 为什么 你 要 打给 安吉 ？

translation.en: -Poy, let it go. Poy, I can do it. -Let me do it, Bash.
translation.zh: - 阿波   放手   让 我 自己 来   - 小莎   我 来 就 好

translation.en: -I can do this. -Bash…
translation.zh: - 阿波   让 我 自己 来   - 小莎

translation.en: Poy!
translation.zh: 阿波

translation.en: I give up, Poy.
translation.zh: 阿波   我 放弃 了

translation.en: I don't know if what I'm doing is right.
translation.zh: 我 不 知道 自己 究竟 是 对 是 错

translation.en: All I know is that we have to end this.
translation.zh: 我 只 知道 我们 必须 结束 这一切

translation.en: Basha, if this is about your job again,
translation.zh: 巴莎   如果 又 是 因为 工作

translation.en: I understand.
translation.zh: 我 了解

translation.en: I just don't want everything you studied and worked so hard for to go to waste.
translation.zh: 我 只是 不 希望 你 努力 读 的 书   辛苦 这么 久 的 一切 化为乌有

translation.en: Popoy, it's easy for you to say that because you're not in my shoes.
translation.zh: 波普   光用 一 张嘴 说说 很 容易   你 根本 不 明白 我 的 心情

translation.en: You don't know what it's like
translation.zh: 你 不 明白 耗尽 一切 心血

translation.en: to see all that effort go into something you can't even call your own.
translation.zh: 最后 的 成品 却 连 自己 的 作品   都 称 不 上   那 份 心情 有 多 沮丧

translation.en: Bash. I know it's hard,
translation.zh: 巴莎 我 知道 很 困难

translation.en: but we both know this is the only way
translation.zh: 但 我们 也 知道   这是 达成 你 的 梦想

translation.en: for us to reach your dreams, our dreams.
translation.zh: 实现 我们 梦想 的 唯一 方法

translation.en: What if this isn't what I want?
translation.zh: 如果 这不 是 我 要 的 呢 ？

translation.en: What if I don't want to be an architect anymore?
translation.zh: 如果 我 不 想 再 当 建筑师 了 呢 ？

translation.en: What if I pursued this because I fell in love with you?
translation.zh: 如果 我 追求 这一切   仅仅 是 因为 爱上 你 的 缘故 呢 ？

translation.en: but we stick to this, to what's safe, to what's OK?
translation.zh: 却 选择 困守 在 这个 安全 的 象牙塔里 ？

translation.en: Do you really believe that?
translation.zh: 你 真的 那样 相信 ？

translation.en: I don't know…
translation.zh: 我 也 不 知道

translation.en: but I know something's wrong if I'm asking these questions.
translation.zh: 但 我 知道 心中 浮现 出 这些 问题   肯定 是 有 哪里 出错 了

translation.en: It's almost as if
translation.zh: 感觉 就 好像 没 了 波普

translation.en: there wouldn't be a Basha without a Popoy.
translation.zh: 巴莎 也 就 不复 存在 一样

translation.en: Poy!
translation.zh: 阿波

translation.en: Poy. I want to find a life and a job
translation.zh: 我 想 拥有 的 人生 和 工作

translation.en: where I know my worth.
translation.zh: 必须 让 我 知道 自己 的 价值

translation.en: not just because you think it's what's best for us.
translation.zh: 而 不是 依据 你 所 认为   对 我们 最好 的 事物 而 活

translation.en: But I can't do that when you've got everything planned out.
translation.zh: 但 在 你 完美 的 计划 之下   连 这个 想法 都 是 奢望

translation.en: I can't even solve my own problems
translation.zh: 我 连 自己 的 问题 都 解决 不 了

translation.en: because you solve them for me.
translation.zh: 因为 你 都 帮 我 解决 好 了

translation.en: It feels as if I'm surrendering everything to you.
translation.zh: 好像 我 的 一切 都 绕 着 你 旋转

translation.en: It's suffocating me.
translation.zh: 我 快 窒息 了

translation.en: It's exhausting.
translation.zh: 我 好 疲惫

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Let me.
translation.zh: 我 来接 吧

translation.en: Poy, just let Basha be.
translation.zh: 阿波   让 巴莎 自己 静 一 静

translation.en: She's OK,
translation.zh: 她 没事

translation.en: we're getting the car fixed.
translation.zh: 车子 送修 了

translation.en: Krizzy and I will bring her home, OK?
translation.zh: 克莉西 和 我 会 送 她 回家   好 吗 ？

translation.en: OK.
translation.zh: 好   再见

translation.en: Was I wrong?
translation.zh: 我 做 错 了 吗 ？

translation.en: Am I a horrible person?
translation.zh: 我 是 不是 个 大 烂人 ？

translation.en: Go! Make up with him. Then break up again.
translation.zh: 跟 他 和好   然后 再次 分手

translation.en: Then get back together again,
translation.zh: 再次 和好

translation.en: then break up again.
translation.zh: 然后 又 再次 分手

translation.en: Anj, shouldn't we help them fix this?
translation.zh: 安吉   我们 不是 应该 劝 和 不 劝离 吗 ？

translation.en: Popoy's our friend too.
translation.zh: 波普 也 是 我们 的 朋友

translation.en: Krizzy, they can't fix this if Basha is not OK.
translation.zh: 克莉西   如果 巴莎 不 快乐   他们 就 到此为止 了

translation.en: And Basha will never be fine as long as they are together.
translation.zh: 只要 他们 俩 在一起   巴莎 就 没有 真正 快乐 的 时候

translation.en: What happens tomorrow?
translation.zh: 明天 会 怎么样 ？

translation.en: I'd usually tell you to try and fix things.
translation.zh: 我 总是 劝 你 跟 对方 和好

translation.en: But if this is really what both of you need, then just be strong.
translation.zh: 但 如果 你们 俩 真的 必须 分开   那 就 坚强 起来

translation.en: It's going to be painful and difficult, but hopefully…
translation.zh: 虽然 会 伴随 痛苦 和 困难   但是 希望 …

translation.en: Bash, what are you doing?
translation.zh: 小莎   你 在 做 什么 ？

translation.en: Basha, talk to me.
translation.zh: 小莎   跟 我 说话

translation.en: Bash, wait up.
translation.zh: 小莎   等等

translation.en: Bash.
translation.zh: 小莎

translation.en: Do you really want to get away from me so much you have to do this?
translation.zh: 你 真 那么 想 离开 我   到 了 不惜 辞职 的 地步 ？

translation.en: -Basha. -Because this is what I want.

translation.en: but they end up separating, right, Poy?

translation.en: But, I'm not talking about you, Poy.

translation.en: Or Basha.

translation.en: So stop overreacting.

translation.en: It's OK. Chi, congrats.

translation.en: -Thanks. -Cathy, good luck.

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.en: How mean.

translation.en: Don't listen to him.

translation.en: Silly!

translation.en: -Chinno, give her food. -Let's eat.

translation.en: What do you want, baby?

translation.en: Hon, what do you want?

translation.en: Take care! Krizzy come on.

translation.en: -I'll do it. -Sure.

translation.en: Bye.

translation.en: At the site.

translation.en: I'll be fine. Are you gonna be OK?

translation.en: Sorry for disturbing you,

translation.en: I'm just so confused.

translation.en: Popoy?

translation.en: When did I become an expert on him?

translation.en: You're a guy.

translation.en: Mark, we saw each other at Kenneth's.

translation.en: He didn't shout at me.

translation.en: And he was so nice and friendly.

translation.en: He even kissed me before we left.

translation.en: Why did he do that?

translation.en: What does that mean?

translation.en: What's wrong with that?

translation.en: Mark, you were there when he screamed at me.

translation.en: He nearly killed me in his rage. You saw that.

translation.en: What happened?

translation.en: Maybe he's OK now.

translation.en: OK as in he's not mad at me anymore?

translation.en: Bash, OK as in, he's accepted that you're not getting back together ever.
translation.zh: 释怀 的 意思 是   他 接受 你们 永远 不 会 再 复合 的 事实

translation.en: Maybe he's moved on.
translation.zh: 也许 他 放下 过去 了

translation.en: You think?

translation.en: Auntie! Uncle! Sorry I'm late.

translation.en: It took the shuttle so long to leave.

translation.en: Where's your car?

translation.en: -I left it at the shop. -Again?

translation.en: It's full of weeds?

translation.en: -Look for the marker there. -Yes, Dad!

translation.en: Watch what you're doing.

translation.en: What are you doing?

translation.en: Helping.

translation.en: You'll get rashes.

translation.en: Then I'll scratch them.

translation.en: On heels?

translation.en: I can do it.

translation.en: Ready to quit?

translation.en: I'm fine.

translation.en: -What is it? -What happened?

translation.en: Bash? What's wrong? Did I hurt you?

translation.en: Nice view, huh?

translation.en: She's going to be excited when she sees you.

translation.en: Elvie, your ex-future daughter-in-law is here.

translation.en: Basha! Is that you?

translation.en: How are you? You look so beautiful.

translation.en: -You too. -New hair!

translation.en: Basha, my child.

translation.en: -You look really good! How are you? -I'm fine.

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me Basha was with you?

translation.en: I'd have bought her favorite rice cake if I'd known she was coming.

translation.en: -It's supposed to be a surprise. -It's OK. I have to go now.

translation.en: I still have to go home.

translation.en: You're going home this late? I won't allow it.

translation.en: -I can use public transport. -You have to drive her home.

translation.en: Oh, no, it's OK. I don't want to hassle Popoy.

translation.en: He'll have to get gas, then pay the toll.

translation.en: It's going to cost a lot.

translation.en: -No need. I'm OK. -No, I insist. You have to drive her.

translation.en: It's really OK.

translation.en: -Poy, you don't have to. -Come on, Bash.

translation.en: -You heard him. -Go.

translation.en: Let's go?

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Good thing we took this route. The traffic on the highway is horrible.

translation.en: -Excuse me. -Oh, sorry.
translation.zh: - 抱歉   - 对不起

translation.en: Are you cold?

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 会

translation.en: New car.

translation.en: You must have lots of money.

translation.en: Nope.

translation.en: Just had a lot of leftover savings from…

translation.en: That's Tricia's.

translation.en: Is she an engineer?

translation.en: Does she know…

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 知道

translation.en: In fact she's excited to see the house…

translation.en: Wow.

translation.en: Really?

translation.en: How long have you been together?

translation.en: One month, uh, Thursday.

translation.en: I was supposed to pick her up after our dinner

translation.en: but she had another gig.

translation.en: She likes it when I pick her up, like I'm still courting her.

translation.en: And whenever I'm late…

translation.en: But you're never late…

translation.en: Well, I am now.

translation.en: When I'm late, it's war.

translation.en: And it's so hard to make peace with her.

translation.en: I have to give her everything she asks for.

translation.en: But that's it. She's the boss.

translation.en: How about you and Mark?

translation.en: How long have you been together?

translation.en: He was never my boyfriend.

translation.en: Here, ma'am. Are you going to buy it?

translation.en: -Yes, here it is… -This is good quality.

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: I'm buying this one. Look OK?

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: -I got this. It's OK. -Taking it?

translation.en: No, here…

translation.en: It's OK.
translation.zh: 没关系

translation.en: How are you two?

translation.en: Who?

translation.en: You and Basha?

translation.en: Have you done the plans?

translation.en: Not yet.

translation.en: But we know what to do

translation.en: because we know what Auntie wants.

translation.en: It's gonna be easy.

translation.en: That's good.
translation.zh: 那 就 好

translation.en: That means you'll finish soon.

translation.en: Why did you throw this away? It's pretty.

translation.en: There's something missing.

translation.en: This one too. It's really good.

translation.en: It doesn't suit the lot.

translation.en: Look at the lot.

translation.en: It doesn't fit the lot.

translation.en: Who's your client anyway?

translation.en: Popoy's aunt.
translation.zh: 波普 的 阿姨

translation.en: And Popoy is the engineer?

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Bash, that's how I was when I saw Beng for the first time after the break up.
translation.zh: 小莎   分手 后 我 第一 次 看到 颦   反应 就 跟 你 如出一辙

translation.en: I was trying too hard to impress her.

translation.en: I'm not trying hard to impress him.

translation.en: Am I that obvious?

translation.en: Guys, who wants orange cake?
translation.zh: 各位   谁 要 橙子 蛋糕 ？

translation.en: -Yes, for sure. -How about you, JP?

translation.en: Anj, Basha and Mark never got together?

translation.en: Never.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: That's what happens when you don't ask.
translation.zh: 谁 叫 你 不 先 问 清楚

translation.en: Are you sure?

translation.en: I feel like something's missing.

translation.en: -This is where Aunt Edith commented. -Here, Hon, I'll give you some.

translation.en: Looks like it lacks something.
translation.zh: 看起来 似乎 少 了 点 什么

translation.en: Poy, what if we lessen the walkway
translation.zh: 阿波   还是 要 把 走道 缩短

translation.en: to maximize the space.
translation.zh: 把 空间 扩大 ？

translation.en: -Could we do that? -Of course.
translation.zh: 可以 那样 吗 ？   当然 可以

translation.en: That's what we did with our house, so let's just do it to this one.
translation.zh: 以前 我们 的 房子 就是 那样 的   这 间 当然 也 能 比照 办理

translation.en: What else?
translation.zh: 还有 什么 ？

translation.en: I like that.
translation.zh: 我 喜欢

translation.en: Me too.
translation.zh: 我 也 是

translation.en: Bash, Auntie Edith called.
translation.zh: 小莎   伊迪丝 阿姨 打 来 了

translation.en: She's asking when we can make the presentation of the final plans.
translation.zh: 她 问 什么 时候 能 向 她 报告 最后 定案

translation.en: -Not now please. -Hello?
translation.zh: - 不要 现在   - 喂 ？

translation.en: Not now please.
translation.zh: 不 要是 现在

translation.en: Bash, am I calling at a bad time?
translation.zh: 小莎   我 打 来得 不是 时候 吗 ？

translation.en: No! My car is breaking down…
translation.zh: 不   我 的 车 又 抛锚 了

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.zh: 你 在 哪里 ？

translation.en: I'm at Visayas Ave.
translation.zh: 我 在 维施 耶 大道

translation.en: Wait just a moment.
translation.zh: 请稍 等

translation.en: Why did you get out?
translation.zh: 你 怎么 出来 了 ？

translation.en: The towing service is coming. Wait.
translation.zh: 道路 救援 服务 就 快 到 了   等 一下

translation.en: Here, let's go!
translation.zh: 好   走 吧

translation.en: Bash, this way.
translation.zh: 小莎   坐 后面

translation.en: Hurry.
translation.zh: 快

translation.en: Here's a tissue.
translation.zh: 卫生纸 给 你

translation.en: You know, you're lucky you were on our way,
translation.zh: 还 好 我们 刚好 在 半路 上

translation.en: otherwise you'd have been stuck there.
translation.zh: 否则 你 就要 被 困在 这里 了

translation.en: Baby, your shirt is wet.
translation.zh: 宝贝   你 的 上衣 都 湿 了

translation.en: Are you going to tell me about it or do I have to guess?
translation.zh: 你 会 自己 开口   还是 要 我 猜 ？

translation.en: I knew he'd found someone new.
translation.zh: 我 知道 他 有 别人 了

translation.en: But it only became real tonight.
translation.zh: 但 直到 今晚 我 才 觉得 真实

translation.en: And it hurts so much.
translation.zh: 我 的 心好 痛

translation.en: You have to elevate this.
translation.zh: 这里 必须 弄 高 一点

translation.en: And the walkway is too wide.
translation.zh: 走道 太 宽 了

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me that the last time we saw each other
translation.zh: 最后 一 次 碰面 时   为什么 你 什么 都 不说

translation.en: instead of complaining about it now?
translation.zh: 现在 才 开始 大肆 抱怨 ？

translation.en: The materials you chose are all too expensive.
translation.zh: 你 选择 的 建材 都 太 贵 了

translation.en: Why did you change the costings
translation.zh: 那 为什么 你 修改 预算 前

translation.en: without consulting me or Auntie Edith first?
translation.zh: 不 先 征询 我 或 伊迪丝 阿姨 的 意见 ？

translation.en: Because it's my job to meet the budget of the clients.
translation.zh: 因为 符合 客户 预算 是 我 的 职责

translation.en: But you can't change the materials just because you want to cut costs.
translation.zh: 但 你 不 能 因为 想 降低 预算   就 把 建材 全部 换掉

translation.en: I think you're too pressured by the timetable.
translation.zh: 你们 应该 是 被 进度 逼 得 太 紧 了

translation.en: It's not worth arguing about it. Don't worry about it.
translation.zh: 不要 急   心平气和 地 讨论 就 好

translation.en: You're going to ruin the overall aesthetics of the design.
translation.zh: 你 会 把 整体 的 设计 美感 全部 破坏 掉

translation.en: -Aesthetics is pointless… -Pointless?
translation.zh: - 美感 根本 无关紧要   - 无关紧要 ？

translation.en: Popoy, I thought about those details, so don't tell me they're pointless
translation.zh: 波普   我 在 那些 细节 上 煞费苦心   别 因为 你 觉得 贵

translation.en: simply because you find them expensive.
translation.zh: 就 告诉 我 一切 无关 紧要

translation.en: You make it sound as if I don't care.
translation.zh: 说 得 好像 我 都 不在乎 一样

translation.en: I only want to make sure we can build this very impossible house you want.
translation.zh: 我 只是 想 尽力 打造   这 栋 你 想要 但 不 可能 实现 的 房子 而已

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 你 说 什么 ？

translation.en: I'm with Uncle Willie and Auntie Edith.
translation.zh: 我 跟 威利 叔叔 和 伊迪丝 阿姨 在一起

translation.en: I have to go back to the office.
translation.zh: 我 要 回 办公室 一 趟

translation.en: My battery's running low…
translation.zh: 我 的 手机 快 没 电 了

translation.en: -Wait. I'll call you later. -Bye.
translation.zh: 等 一下   我 再 回电 给 你

translation.en: Basha wait. Let's talk about the revisions.
translation.zh: 巴莎   等等   我们 来 谈谈 如何 修正

translation.en: You left your plans.
translation.zh: 你 忘记 把 设计 图 带走 了

translation.en: I'll take care of it. I'll just text you.
translation.zh: 我 会 重新 修过   再 发 短信 给 你

translation.en: Can you at least try to be professional?
translation.zh: 巴莎   专业 一点 好 吗 ？

translation.en: I am being professional about this.
translation.zh: 这就 是 我 专业 的 一面

translation.en: Yes, I can see that.
translation.zh: 好   看 得 出来

translation.en: Why are you being like this?
translation.zh: 你 为什么 要 这么 情绪化 ？

translation.en: Because I'm commenting on your plans?
translation.zh: 因为 我 批评 你 的 设计 图 ？

translation.en: I'm not upset. I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我 没 生气   我 很 好

translation.en: -There you go again. -There I go what again?
translation.zh: - 又 来 了   - 什么 又 来 了 ？

translation.en: There.

translation.en: Saying that there's no problem when there is.

translation.en: Ben.

translation.en: was the original author of this method.

translation.en: other than the fact that he discovered the Kabbalah about 300 years before Madonna.

translation.en: All right, now, let's give Ben a chance for some extra credit, shall we?

translation.en: We're gonna call this the game show host problem, all right?
translation.zh: 我们 称之为 游戏 节目 主持人 问题

translation.en: Ben, suppose you're on a game show.
translation.zh: 本 ， 假设 你 参加 了 一个 游戏 节目

translation.en: And you are given a chance to choose from three different doors, all right?
translation.zh: 给 你 机会 选择 三 个 不同 的 门

translation.en: Now, behind one of the doors is a new car. Behind the other two, goats.
translation.zh: 现在 ， 其中 一 扇门 后 是 一 辆 新 车   另外 两 扇 门后 是 山羊

translation.en: Which door would you choose, Ben?

translation.en: Door number one?
translation.zh: 1号 门 ？

translation.en: Door number one. Ben chooses door number one.
translation.zh: 1号 门 ， 本 选择 了 1号 门

translation.en: All right, now, the game show host,
translation.zh: 好 ， 现在 ， 游戏 节目 主持人

translation.en: who, by the way, knows what's behind all the other doors,

translation.en: decides to open another door. Let's say he chooses door number three.
translation.zh: 他 决定 打开 另外 一 扇 门   比如说 他 选择 了 第三 扇 门

translation.en: Behind which sits a goat. Now...

translation.en: Ben, game show host comes up to you.
translation.zh: 本 ， 游戏 节目 主持人 过来 问 你

translation.en: He says, "Ben, do you want to stay with door number one
translation.zh: 他 问 ： "本 ， 你 仍然 想要 1号 门

translation.en: "or go with door number two?"
translation.zh: " 还是 选择 2号 门 ？ "

translation.en: Now, is it in your interest to switch your choice?

translation.en: -Yeah. -Well, wait.
translation.zh: - 对   - 等等

translation.en: Remember, the host knows where the car is

translation.en: so how do you know he's not playing a trick on you?

translation.en: Trying to use reverse psychology to get you to pick a goat?

translation.en: Well, I wouldn't really care. I mean, my answer's based on statistics.
translation.zh: 我 真的 不在乎   我 的 答案 是 基于 统计学 的

translation.en: Based on variable change.
translation.zh: 基于 可变 变化 的

translation.en: Variable change? But he just asked you a simple question.
translation.zh: 可变 变化 ？ 但 他 问 的 只是 个 简单 问题

translation.en: Yeah, which changed everything.
translation.zh: 对 ， 这就 全 变 了

translation.en: Enlighten us.

translation.en: Well, when I was originally asked to choose a door,
translation.zh: 当 一开始 让 我 选择 一 扇门 的 时候

translation.en: I had a 33.3% chance of choosing right.
translation.zh: 我 有 33.3% 的 机会 选择 正确

translation.en: But after he opens one of the doors and then re-offers me the choice,
translation.zh: 但是 他 打开 一 扇门 后 ， 再次 给 我 机会

translation.en: it's now 66.7% if I choose to switch.

translation.en: So, yeah, I'll take door number two, and thank you for that extra 33.3%.

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 完全 正确

translation.en: People, remember,
translation.zh: 大家 记住

translation.en: if you don't know which door to open, always account for variable change.

translation.en: Now, see, most people wouldn't take the switch

translation.en: out of paranoia, fear, emotions.

translation.en: But Mr. Campbell, he kept emotions aside

translation.en: I mean, if I can get anything close to that, then I'm done.
translation.zh: 如果 我 能够 接近 这个 数 ， 我 就 撤

translation.en: Well, in the first place, Ben, it's not "if," it's "when."
translation.zh: 首先 ， 本 ， 这不 是 " 如果 " 的 问题   这是 " 什么 时候 " 的 问题

translation.en: And second of all, I get it. I completely understand.
translation.zh: 第二 ， 我 懂 了 ， 我 完全 理解 了

translation.en: -You do? -Yeah. It's a means to an end.
translation.zh: - 你 懂 了 ？   - 对 ， 这是 实现 目标 的 手段 而已

translation.en: Look, they've got this new computer software that reads people's faces,
translation.zh: 看 ， 他们 有 了 这个 新 的 电脑 软件   能够 识别人 脸

translation.en: so who knows how long this gig's gonna last for any of us?
translation.zh: 所以 谁 知道 这 场 戏 还 能 演多久 呢 ？

translation.en: What if we get caught?
translation.zh: 我们 被 抓住 怎么办 ？

translation.en: Our system keeps us under the radar, you'll see.
translation.zh: 我们 的 系统 让 我们 躲 在 雷达 眼皮 底下   你 会 看到 的

translation.en: Anyway, counting cards isn't illegal.
translation.zh: 无论如何 ， 数牌 不 犯法

translation.en: -So, there's no danger in it at all? -No, Ben, it's safe. Very safe.
translation.zh: - 所以 ， 一点儿 危险 都 没有 ？   - 本 ， 这是 安全 的 ， 很 安全

translation.en: You think you can beat the system?
translation.zh: 你 以为 你 能 打败 系统 吗 ？

translation.en: This is the system, beating you back.
translation.zh: 这就 是 系统 ， 在 对 你 进行 反击

translation.en: You wanna count cards, you do it in Atlantic City.
translation.zh: 你 想 数牌 ， 到 亚特兰大 去 数

translation.en: -Get him up. -Come on, kid.
translation.zh: - 把 他 弄 起来   - 来 吧 ， 孩子

translation.en: Count to five.
translation.zh: 数 到 五

translation.en: -Count to five! -What?
translation.zh: - 数 到 五 ！   - 怎么 ？

translation.en: Count to five so I know you don't have brain damage, you can go home.
translation.zh: 数 到 五 ， 这样 我 就 知道 你 没有   大脑 损伤 ， 还 能 回家

translation.en: Start with one.
translation.zh: 从 1 开始

translation.en: One, two, three, four, five.
Good. Now, stop counting.
translation.zh: 好 ， 现在 ， 停止 数牌

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们 走

translation.en: You're crazy, everybody knows to split eights.

translation.en: My grandmother splits eights.

translation.en: Not against a 10. It's a sucker play.
translation.zh: 不是 一个 10 ， 牌 真 臭

translation.en: Look, you're choosing to play two hands
translation.zh: 看 ， 你 选择 玩 两手

translation.en: against the highest up card a dealer can have, right?

translation.en: Against a five or a six, it'd be fine.
translation.zh: 和 一个 5一 个 6 比 ， 牌 还 凑合

translation.en: Against a 10 or an ace, it's a sucker play.
translation.zh: 和 一个 10一 个 A比 ， 那 就是 臭牌 了

translation.en: Yeah, Kianna, save it, all right? Jill's right. All right?
translation.zh: 对 ， 基亚娜 ， 省 省 好 吗 ？   吉尔 是 对 的 ， 好 吗 ？

translation.en: Choi, why don't you explain to Ben how we do?
translation.zh: 崔 ， 你 给 本 解释 一下 我们 怎么 做 吧 ？

translation.en: Oh, all right.
translation.zh: 哦 ， 好 吧

translation.en: So, our team is divided into two kinds of players,
translation.zh: 我们 的 团队 分成 两 类 成员

translation.en: spotters and big players, right?
translation.zh: 侦察员 和 大玩家 ， 懂 了 吗 ？

translation.en: So if you think that this table is the casino floor,
translation.zh: 如果 你 把 这 张 桌子 想象 成 赌场 的 大厅

translation.en: then salt and pepper shakers are your spotters.
translation.zh: 这 对 儿盐 和 胡椒瓶子 就是 我们 的 侦察员

translation.en: Spotters are just sitting at the various blackjack tables
translation.zh: 侦察员 只是 坐在 不同 的 21点 牌桌 前

translation.en: and they're betting the table minimum. They never fluctuate their bet.
translation.zh: 他们 赌 的 是 每桌 的 最低 限额   他们 从来 不 忽大 忽 小

translation.en: That's right. Spotters never raise the bet or play any kind of progressive system.
translation.zh: 就 这样 ， 侦察员 从来 不 加码   或者 玩 任何 累进 制游戏

translation.en: That's how we stay under the radar, and that's why we never get caught.
translation.zh: 这样 他们 就 在 雷达 的 眼皮 底下   因此 我们 从来 不 会 被 抓住

translation.en: Exactly. Okay, they're just sitting at the table, betting the table min,
translation.zh: 的确 ， 好 了 ， 他们 做 在 桌前   赌每 桌 的 最低 限额

translation.en: and they're keeping the count waiting for one of these decks to get hot.
translation.zh: 他们 进行 数牌 ， 等 着 这 叠牌 变好

translation.en: Right. And then when one of the decks gets hot,
translation.zh: 好 ， 然后 等 其中 一 叠 牌 变 好 了

translation.en: the spotter at that table signals in the big player.
translation.zh: 那桌 的 侦察员 就 给 一个 大 玩家 发信号

translation.en: This... Mustard. Give me the mustard, honey. Please.
translation.zh: 就是 这个 ... 芥末瓶 ， 请 给 我 芥末 ， 甜心

translation.en: Well, I'm always the mustard, so...
translation.zh: 嗯 ， 我 总是 芥末 ， 所以 ...

translation.en: When I get the signal for the hot deck, I stumble over like some drunk rich kid,
translation.zh: 当 我 得到 了 好牌 的 信号 ， 我 就 像 个   喝醉 了 的 富家 子弟 一样 跌跌撞撞 地 过来

translation.en: or some zoned out dot-com millionaire, and I throw down big money.
translation.zh: 要不 就是 稀里糊涂 的 网络 新贵   然后 我 一掷千金

translation.en: So the big player bets big and still keeps the count.
translation.zh: 所以 大玩家 下 大 赌注 但是 仍然 保持 数牌

translation.en: When the deck cools, he cashes in.
translation.zh: 等 牌局 冷淡 下来 ， 他 就 兑现 走人

translation.en: It's not as easy as it sounds.
translation.zh: 不 像 听上去 那么 容易

translation.en: Oh, yeah, it's not, you know,
translation.zh: 哦 ， 真的 ， 你 看

translation.en: because if Grey Poupon over here ever loses the count,
translation.zh: 因为 如果 这个 芥末 瓶数 牌数 丢 了

translation.en: it's up to his table's spotter to give him the signal to get out.

translation.en: -And you know the signals, right? -Yeah.
translation.zh: - 你 认识 那些 信号 ， 对 吗 ？   - 对

translation.en: Show us.
translation.zh: 给 我们 看

translation.en: Okay, what's this?
translation.zh: 好 ， 这是 什么 ？

translation.en: -The deck's hot. -Right.
translation.zh: - 这 叠牌 很 好   - 对

translation.en: We need to talk.
translation.zh: 我们 要 谈谈

translation.en: The deck's cooling.
translation.zh: 这 牌 不 好 了

translation.en: And get out. Get out now.
translation.zh: 撤 ， 立刻 就 撤

translation.en: Good. I think he's gonna be ready for our little trial run tomorrow.
translation.zh: 好 ， 我 想 他 明天 可以 小试牛刀 了

translation.en: There's a trial run?

translation.en: -Where? -You'll find out.
translation.zh: - 在 哪儿 ？   - 你 会 知道 的

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嗨

translation.en: -You Ben? -Yeah.
translation.zh: - 你 是 本 ？   - 对

translation.en: Follow me.
translation.zh: 跟着 我

translation.en: This way.
translation.zh: 这边

translation.en: Go, go. You go.
translation.zh: 走 ， 你 往前 走

translation.en: No more bet. No more bet.

translation.en: Come on, money.

translation.en: Today, 14.
translation.zh: 今天 ， 14

translation.en: Whose side are you on?

translation.en: Sixteen.
Thank you. Sorry, gentlemen.

translation.en: -You wanna put that money down? -Yeah. $300.
translation.zh: - 你 想 把 那些 钱 押上 ？   - 对 ， 300 美元
300 美元
300 美元

translation.en: You bet, sir?

translation.en: Thanks.

translation.en: Winner, winner, chicken dinner.
translation.zh: 赢家 、 赢家 、 赢家 吃 鸡

translation.en: "Winner, winner, chicken dinner." All right.
translation.zh: " 赢家 、 赢家 、 赢家 吃 鸡" ， 对 啦

translation.en: Nice.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: Can I get another drink, please?

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.en: What's the count?

translation.en: Plus 18.
Oh, you've gotta be kidding.

translation.en: Congratulations, Ben.

translation.en: We didn't mean it.

translation.en: and I've never had a student as impressive as you.

translation.en: You're gonna do great. You know how I know that?

translation.zh: 我们 遵从 一 套 特别 的 规则 ， 玩 一个 系统

translation.en: Right.

translation.en: and sometimes, people lose control.

translation.zh: 明天 ？ 我 还有 一个 数字 认识 的   论文 星期二 要 交

translation.en: -No, you don't. -I don't?

translation.en: No, I spoke to Professor O'Reilly.

translation.en: I told him you were helping me with a special assignment,

translation.en: and he understood, so he gave you an A.

translation.en: You see, Ben, amazing things can happen from the inside.
translation.zh: 你 看 ， 本 ， 从 内部 能够 发生   令 人 惊异 的 事情

translation.en: You'll get a call about details later.
translation.zh: 你 晚些时候 会 接到 电话 是 有关 细节 的

translation.en: Oh, yeah. They got a lot more bags to check, you know?
translation.zh: 对 ， 她们 有 很多 包要 检查

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好 吧

translation.en: Well, wait for us by security 'cause Ben and I are gonna hit the head.
translation.zh: 在 安检 那里 等 我   因为 本 和 我 要 去 洗手间

translation.en: No, I'm good.
translation.zh: 不 ， 我 不用 去

translation.en: No, I really think you should go. It's a long flight.

translation.en: -No, I'm okay. -We're going to the bathroom.
translation.zh: - 不 ， 我 还 行   - 我们 去 洗手间 了

translation.en: Honestly, I really don't have to go.
translation.zh: 说 实话 ， 我 真的 不用 去

translation.en: -I don't care what you have to do. -Look, I really don't have to...
translation.zh: - 我 不管 你 用 不用 去   - 看 ， 我 真的 不用 ...

translation.en: Please just shut up.
translation.zh: 请 闭嘴

translation.en: Why are you looking over there? Look, I don't...

translation.en: Don't ask questions.
translation.zh: 别 问

translation.en: -Shove these in your underwear. -Why?
translation.zh: - 把 这些 塞在 你 内裤 里   - 为什么 ？

translation.en: You want me to do it? 'Cause, I swear to God, I will.
translation.zh: 你 想要 我 做 ？   因为 我 对天发誓 ， 我 会 的

translation.en: -Why can't we leave it in the bag? -Because it shows up on the scanner.
translation.zh: - 为什么 我们 不 能 把 钱 放 袋子 里 ？   - 因为 扫描机 上 能 看 出来

translation.en: And we're not about to have them confiscate $250,000.
translation.zh: 我们 不 能 让 他们 没收 25万 美元
25万 美元 ？

translation.en: -No. Why do I have to do it? -'Cause you're the donkey boy.
translation.zh: - 不 ， 为什么 非得 我 做 ？   - 因为 你 是 小驴

translation.en: You really suck at not asking questions.
translation.zh: 你 可 真烂 ， 连 问题 都 不 问

translation.en: What's a donkey boy?
translation.zh: 什么 是 小驴 ？

translation.en: -Step forward, sir. -Thanks.
translation.zh: - 往前 一 步 ， 先生   - 谢谢

translation.en: -In the basket, please. -There's a table when you get to the line.
translation.zh: - 请 放在 篮子 里   - 你 到 那 条线 的 时候 有 个 桌子

translation.en: Act casual, think casual, be casual.
translation.zh: 行动 如常 ， 思想 如常 ， 随便 些

translation.en: Remove your keys, any metal objects. Laptops out, please.
translation.zh: 拿出 您 的 钥匙 、 任何 金属 制品   请 掏出 笔记本 电脑

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: If you have liquids in a Ziploc bag, please show them to us now.
translation.zh: 如果 我 在 塑料 袋里 有 液体   请 拿给 我们 看

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: - 谢谢 您   - 不 客气

translation.en: Your boarding pass.
translation.zh: 你 的 登机卡

translation.en: Sir?
translation.zh: 先生 ？

translation.zh: 您 忘记 拿包 了

translation.en: Thanks.

translation.en: Burt, Moishe, Vladimir,
translation.zh: 伯特 、 莫伊西 、 弗拉基米尔

translation.zh: 莫娜 、 索摩斯 小姐   你 的 新 身份证 在 吧台 上

translation.en: So glad you could make it.

translation.en: Your hobbies are backgammon, chess and long walks on the beach.
translation.zh: 你 的 兴趣 是 步步高 、 国际 象棋   还有 在 海滩 上 长 时间 漫步

translation.en: -I don't like my name. -Why not?

translation.en: "Sierra Sommers." Do I look like a Sierra?
translation.zh: "西 埃拉索摩斯 "   我 看上去 像 个 西埃拉 吗 ？

translation.zh: 是 合法 的 ， 我们 不仅 必须 用 假 名字   我们 还要 伪装 呢

translation.en: It's for the benefit of the dealers to make sure you're old enough to gamble
translation.zh: 是 为了 让 庄家 相信   你 足够 大 ， 可以 赌博 了

translation.en: and it allows everyone to be different people in different casinos.

Tell me something, Cole, if you can count that well,

translation.en: Then why are you still here?

translation.en: Because I wanna still be here. I like being here.

translation.en: So does everybody else.

translation.en: Yeah, can I get a drink?

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think they're gonna help. Let's go! Come on.

translation.en: Let's take a walk, huh?

translation.en: Come on, kid. See if we can't get you that chicken dinner.

translation.en: It's called Biometrics.

translation.en: Biometrics. It's sort of like a fingerprint of your face.

translation.en: Biometric profile.

translation.en: ...biometric profile of your face,

translation.en: cross-references it with a database of counters.

translation.en: Software'll probably put you and me out of business, but it still can't do this.

translation.en: All right.

translation.en: You understand all this. You go to MIT.
translation.zh: 你 对 这些 都 懂 ， 你 就 去 麻省 理工

translation.en: Smart boy.
translation.zh: 聪明 男生

translation.en: My name is Cole Williams.
translation.zh: 我 叫 克尔威廉姆斯

translation.en: And if I ever see you in this town again,

translation.en: I will break your cheek bone with a small hammer,

translation.en: and then I will kill you.

translation.en: Please. Please just take the money.

translation.en: You can take it.

translation.en: Tell me,
translation.zh: 告诉 我

translation.en: how's good old Professor Rosa doing, huh?

translation.en: Oh, yeah. Me and Micky, we go way back.

translation.en: I spent years, chased him all over this town.

translation.en: Giving him beat downs left and right, only to find him at the tables a week later.
translation.zh: 四处 发现 他 打败 的 敌手   但 总是 一 周 后 才 找到

translation.en: He was very persistent.
translation.zh: 他 很 有 耐力

translation.en: And then, one September night,
translation.zh: 然后 ， 一个 九月 的 夜晚

translation.en: when I was in Barstow at my father's funeral,

translation.en: my casino was taken for seven figures.

translation.en: Can you imagine that?

translation.en: The most ever taken by a single counter in one night.

translation.en: 'Course I was, naturally, unceremoniously fired.

translation.en: Funny thing, though.

translation.en: I never saw Micky Rosa after that.

translation.en: Never.

translation.en: Cauchy was the first to make a rigorous study

translation.en: of the conditions for convergence of an infinite series.

translation.en: And was concerned with developing

translation.en: the basic theorems of the calculus as rigorously as possible.

translation.en: Any questions?

translation.en: No? All right, moving on.

translation.en: Isn't it true Cauchy stole from his students?

translation.en: Yes, I heard that. What's your theory on that?

translation.en: They say he used his students for their brilliance,

translation.en: then discredited them and stole their equations,

translation.en: stole their hard work.

translation.en: Well, that wouldn't be the first time a teacher was accused of that.

translation.en: I think what he's referring to is Vladimir Stupnitsky, yes?

translation.en: He was a student of Cauchy's who accused Cauchy

translation.en: of stealing his four-volume text on this analysis

translation.en: and publishing it under a pseudonym.

translation.en: Of course, nobody knows what really went down there.

translation.en: They never did prove it, and without the proof, it's a little like it never happened.

translation.en: And, you know, it's a real shame,

translation.en: because if Stupnitsky had just realized that he shouldn't have crossed Cauchy,

translation.en: this was the dispute,

translation.en: if he'd been able to get beyond some of the personal mistakes that were made,

translation.en: I have no doubt that Cauchy would have worked with him again,

translation.en: and they could have done great things together.

translation.en: But, as history shows us, some students never learn.

translation.en: You should get that eye looked at.

translation.en: You okay?

translation.en: Everything's gone.

translation.en: -What are you talking about? -Micky, he's taken everything.

translation.en: I gotta find a way to get it back.

translation.en: Are you insane?

translation.en: You just got the shit kicked out of you and you won't let this go!

translation.en: Look, what am I supposed to do, Jill? I've just lost everything!

translation.en: Look, please...
I don't want to lose you, too.

translation.en: Ben, you were dragged away in Vegas.

translation.en: I haven't heard from you. I had no idea where you were.

translation.en: I know.

translation.en: I know.

translation.en: You know, I'm so sorry that I hurt you.

translation.en: In Vegas, I don't know what happened. That wasn't me.
translation.zh: 在 拉斯维加斯 ， 我 不 知道 发生 了 什么   那 不是 我

translation.en: Look, you know me.
translation.zh: 看 着 ， 你 了解 我

translation.en: You know what I'm like.
translation.zh: 你 知道 我 是 什么样 的

translation.en: You know me.

translation.en: I just... I need you to trust me.

translation.en: And the winner of this year's 2.09

translation.en: for excellence in the field of robotics goes to the team of Conolly and Kazazi!
translation.zh: 科诺利 和 卡扎基 小组 ， 表彰 他们   在 机器人 领域 的 杰出 表现

translation.en: That's it. That's the story.
translation.zh: 就 这些 ， 这就 是 我 的 故事

translation.en: Jill Taylor. Really?

translation.en: -Yeah. Yeah, really. -Wow.
translation.zh: - 对 ， 真的   - 哇

translation.en: Yeah, it doesn't feel like "wow," Miles. I really screwed up.
translation.zh: 对 ， 不 觉得 " 哇" ， 麦尔斯 ， 我 搞 砸 了

translation.en: Yeah, you did. But you had a life experience.

translation.en: I can't believe how I treated you, Miles.

translation.en: You know, you're my best friend, and I really let you down.

translation.en: I really let you down. I'm sorry.

translation.en: And I'm happy for you, you know? Winning the 2.09? That's great.

translation.en: -Jill Taylor. Really? -Yeah.

translation.en: Money, girls,

translation.en: high-roller suites, clubs, Vegas.

translation.en: Yeah, I think I probably would have blown off the 2.09 Competition, too.

translation.en: So we cool?

translation.en: Yeah, we're cool.
translation.zh: 对 ， 我们 是 朋友

translation.en: But you better believe that you're gonna make this up to me, big time.
translation.zh: 但是 你 得 好好 补偿 我

translation.en: All right.
translation.zh: 好 吧

translation.en: So, what are you gonna do now?
translation.zh: 那么 ， 你 现在 要 做 什么 ？

translation.en: What do you want, Ben? This is an alumni dinner.
translation.zh: 你 想要 什么 ， 本 ？   这是 校友 晚宴

translation.en: You need a diploma to come to one of these.

translation.en: Wait. Stupnitsky wants back in.
translation.zh: 等等 ， 司徒 普尼斯基 想要 回来

translation.en: What?

translation.en: Look, I've had some time to think about what you said.
translation.zh: 我 花 时间 想 了 您 说 的话

translation.en: I want back in.
translation.zh: 我 想要 回来

translation.en: -Why now? -Because I have nothing else.
translation.zh: - 为什么 现在 回来 ？   - 因为 除此之外 我 什么 都 没 了

translation.en: All right, look, Ben. I'm not gonna lie to you. You're good, you're very, very good.
translation.zh: 好 吧 ， 本 ， 我 不 会 对 你 撒谎   你 很 好 ， 你 非常 棒

translation.en: But you did exactly what I told you not to. You got emotional and then you got stupid.
translation.zh: 但是 你 做 的 事 ， 恰好 是 我 告诉 你 不要   去 做 的 ， 你 感情用事 就 变傻 了

translation.en: Now you tell me why in the world I'd ever get back in business with you.
translation.zh: 现在 你 告诉 我 ， 究竟 为什么 我 可以   回过头 来 与 你 共事

translation.en: Look, I know I should never have disrespected you, all right? I know that.

translation.en: With this facial recognition software,
translation.zh: 有 了 这个 面部 识别 软件

translation.en: our window of opportunity is closing in on us.
translation.zh: 我们 的 机会 越来越 少 了

translation.en: Now, I need this, Micky. I really, really need this.
translation.zh: 我 现在 真的 需要 这个 ， 米奇   我 非常 需要 这个

translation.en: Well, the take would have to be really, really good to get me even vaguely interested.
translation.zh: 不过 ， 要 想 让 我 感兴趣 的话   条件 得 非常 好 才 行

translation.en: Well, you know, that's why I was thinking maybe you should be the other big player.
translation.zh: 这就 是 为什么 我 想   你 应该 是 另外 那个 大 玩家 的 原因

translation.en: You know, two big players playing big?
translation.zh: 你 看 ， 两 个 大 玩家 好 赢得 很多 ？

translation.en: Hey, slow down, I haven't played in a long time, Ben.
translation.zh: 嗨 ， 慢 点儿   我 已经 很 久 不 玩 了 ， 本

translation.en: But Fisher's out.
translation.zh: 但是 费舍尔 退出 了

translation.en: No one else on the team can be the big player, can they?
translation.zh: 团队 里面 其他人   都 不 能 当 大玩家 ， 对 吧 ？

translation.en: And if we do well, if we do really well,
translation.zh: 如果 我们 做 得 好 ， 如果 我们 做 得 真 好

translation.en: then you get your grades back, get to Harvard Med,
translation.zh: 那么 你 就 可以 拿回 你 的 学位   进哈佛 医学院

translation.en: and I might even get that sabbatical.
translation.zh: 我 也 能 来 个 停薪留职 学术 假

translation.en: Well, amazing things can be done from the inside, right?
translation.zh: 嗯 ， 从 内部 总是 能 做成   不可思议 的 事情 ， 对 吧 ？

translation.en: Just went back to the head of the class.
translation.zh: 还是 回去 成为 我 班上 的 魁首

translation.en: I gotta go be social.

translation.en: All right, now listen. It's different out there this time.
translation.zh: 好 吧 ， 听 着 ， 这次 会 不同

translation.en: The stakes are high and it's more dangerous.

translation.en: But the return is gonna be the biggest.
translation.zh: 但是 回报 将 是 最 大 的

translation.en: Now they know our faces, so we're gonna wear disguises.
translation.zh: 现在 他们 认识 我们 的 脸 了   所以 我们 需要 化妆

translation.en: who remain friends for life.

translation.en: Charlotte heard Freddie say

translation.en: Thanks.

translation.en: I didn't really come prepared. Didn't figure I'd be here this long.

translation.en: Here.

translation.en: Call your parents, call your therapist. Knock yourself out.

translation.en: But why would you do this for me?

translation.en: I mean, you think I'm a total asshole.

translation.en: No. You behave like an asshole.

translation.en: There's a difference.

translation.en: Look, I know that I'm not some Malibu therapist,

translation.en: but I can guess that you're feeling scared

translation.en: and a little bit homesick.

translation.en: Which, in my experience,

translation.en: doesn't actually make you a bad person. Just a normal one.

translation.en: Sweet photo.

translation.en: Is it your mum?

translation.en: Is she gonna come out and visit?

translation.en: She died in a car accident when I was 11.

translation.en: Poppy, I'm so sorry.

translation.en: I know you're not some Malibu therapist, but, um...

translation.en: Listen, are you serious about getting out of here?
translation.zh: 听 好

translation.en: Listen, are you serious about getting out of here? Yeah.

translation.en: Yeah. Then you're gonna have to get yourself expelled.

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好的

translation.en: "Anybody disporting themselves in an improper manner will be proposed for expulsion before the Honor Court."
translation.zh: “ 任何 人 以 不 得体 的 方式 嬉戏

translation.en: will be proposed for expulsion before the Honor Court."
translation.zh: 校方 将 向 荣誉 法庭 建议   把 该 名 学生 驱逐 出校 ”

translation.en: Wait, Honor Court?

translation.en: It's like a trial, in front of the whole school, by your peers, your teachers, the head girl,

translation.en: and Mrs. Kingsley.

translation.en: But, I'm telling you, it hardly ever happens.

translation.en: If you really wanna get expelled,

translation.en: you can't just rock the boat.

translation.en: You have to drive it up onto the rocks,

translation.en: set fire to the galley, and dance on the burning deck.

translation.en: You have to take it all the way.

translation.en: Aye, aye, Captain.

translation.en: Make your calls.

translation.en: Oh, tip for best reception.

translation.en: On top of the cupboard.

translation.en: Hi, Ruby, I miss you. I'm gonna escape, though, I promise you.

translation.en: You have no idea what it's like here.

translation.en: Ew! Who is she?

translation.en: Zero lip-gloss upkeep and what's with the sweater from Target?

translation.en: Try to be as imaginative as possible.

translation.en: Vary your targets as much as you can. And although we'll all be helping you,

translation.zh: 哈丽雅特

translation.en: Run along.

translation.en: No, I have certainly not been naughty.

translation.en: (all repeating in French)

translation.en: (stammers)
translation.zh: - 请 上 修道 院山 学校 的 网站 浏览 照片   - 请 上 修道 院山 学校 的 网站 浏览 照片

translation.en: Uh, yes, thank-thank you very much. That's it, thank you.

translation.en: -Mr. Nellist. -Oh, uh, sorry.

translation.en: (Kiki) And then with any luck, she'll recommend you to the Honor Court.

translation.en: She makes a mockery of the system. She's not staying, take it from me.

translation.en: She's not staying, take it from me.

translation.en: not "be a slutty, whorey, shit-brain."

translation.en: (both) So brillianté, Harriet.

translation.en: (sobbing)

translation.en: (whispering)

translation.en: Traditionally, it's fancy dress. This year it's movie magic.

translation.en: This year it's movie magic.

translation.en: morons, and Harriet.

translation.en: Kiki?

translation.en: Okay. Operation Freedom, part two, step one.

translation.en: Okay. Operation Freedom, part two, step one. Attract Freddie.

translation.en: Attract Freddie.

translation.en: Step one, subsection "A", look the part.

translation.en: Kiki, you're actually making something quite exciting

translation.en: but at the same time incredibly slutty and available.

translation.en: In fact, I'm not that bothered about elegance.

translation.en: "So, apparently, the key is to hook up

translation.en: with the headmistress' son.

translation.en: I'll do your trick, Rubes, swing my hips and giggle."

translation.en: Sign your own name, come on.

translation.en: not appearing in a window in Amsterdam.

translation.en: by that attire, Matron.

translation.en: So we had a little look-see in lost property on our way here, didn't we?

translation.en: on our way here, didn't we?

translation.en: (both) We did.

translation.en: It'll suit you,

translation.en: promise.

translation.en: My grandma used to have a dog just like it. Poppy, I think your jumper is the cat's pajamas.

translation.zh: - 恶心   - 你好 啊

translation.en: Girls, I'm all about finding a cure,

translation.en: What we're clear on is that this fire was no accident.

translation.en: but then I got to know you.

translation.en: Harriet.

translation.en: May I remind you that the Honor Court is no place for your personal grandstanding.

translation.en: before the court, as a whole, passes judgment.

translation.en: I've learned so much being here, being with all of you.

translation.en: who I found out was actually a student here.

translation.en: I've had a hole in my heart for five years,

translation.en: and somehow being here,

translation.en: it slowly started to heal.

translation.en: Objection! Sustained.
