translation.en: Just almost fell.
translation.zh: 差点 跌倒

translation.en: -[Eric] Fucking stinks. -[Stacy] Whoa.
translation.zh: 臭死人 ！

translation.en: [Amy] You stink.
translation.zh: 你 才 臭 呢

translation.en: How much further past the stream is it?
translation.zh: 过 了 小溪 要 走 多 远 ？

translation.en: [Mathias] Right after, it says.
translation.zh: 这 上面 说 很快 就 到

translation.en: [Eric] Yeah, well, I don't see any path.
translation.zh: 我 看 不 到 路

translation.en: Can I have some... Thanks.
translation.zh: - 能 不 能 给 我 …   - 谢谢

translation.en: [Stacy] My legs are sore.
translation.zh: 腿 好 酸

translation.en: Look!
translation.zh: 看 ！

translation.en: -[greeting in Spanish] -Don't scare them.
translation.zh: 别 吓 着 他们

translation.en: I'm not gonna scare them. Hello!
translation.zh: 我 不 会 吓到 他们   你好 ？

translation.en: They look sad.
translation.zh: 他们 好像 很 悲伤

translation.en: -[camera clicking] -[Stacy] Hello?
translation.zh: 喂 ？

translation.en: -[Eric] You wanna go talk to them? -[Stacy] Yeah.
translation.zh: - 你们 要 去 跟 他们 讲话 吗 ？   - 好 啊

translation.en: [Amy] Maybe they can guide us.
translation.zh: 也许 他们 能 给 我们 带路

translation.en: [Amy] I don't think they speak Spanish.
translation.zh: 他们 恐怕 不 会 说 西班牙语

translation.en: Look.
translation.zh: 看

translation.en: [Stacy] Where's he going?
translation.zh: 他 要 去 哪里 ？

translation.en: [Mathias] It's here. This must be it.
translation.zh: - 在 这里   - 肯定 就是 这里

translation.en: [Amy] That's the path?
translation.zh: 那 是 路 ？

translation.en: Why was it covered?
translation.zh: 为什么 隐藏 着 ？

translation.en: [Stacy] I don't think that's the right path.
translation.zh: 我 觉得 这 条 路 不 一定 对

translation.en: -It's on the map? -[Mathias] Yeah.
translation.zh: - 在 地图 上 吗 ？   - 在

translation.en: -It's on the map. -Jeff, do you see how old that map looks?
translation.zh: 在 地图 上   杰弗   你 没 看到 那 张 图 多 旧 了 ？

translation.en: And it was covered. Why would it be covered?
translation.zh: 而且 隐藏 着   为什么 隐藏 起来 ？

translation.en: Maybe the archaeologists don't want people to find their site, guys.
translation.zh: 也许 考古学家 不 希望   人们 发现 考古 现场

translation.en: Great. They're gonna be thrilled to see us then.
translation.zh: 好 啊   他们 看到 我们 肯定 大吃一惊

translation.en: No, maybe they just found something valuable,
translation.zh: 也许 他们 能 发现 珍贵 的 东西

translation.en: and they don't want people to rob it,
translation.zh: 不 愿 遗址 被 盗

translation.en: and just get the Mayans to keep people away.
translation.zh: 就 让 玛雅人 赶走 观光客

translation.en: [Eric] How far away is it? [Mathias] It's not far.
translation.zh: - 有 多 远 ？   - 不 远 了

translation.en: Just feels weird. [Jeff] Well, what do you wanna do?
translation.zh: - 感觉 怪怪 的   - 你 要 怎么样 ？

translation.en: [Jeff] Well, what do you wanna do? Just turn around and walk all the way back?
translation.zh: 赶快 转身 原路 返回

translation.en: [Amy] A hidden path in the middle of the jungle.
translation.zh: 隐藏 的 小路   在 丛林 中

translation.en: [Eric] So, do you think those kids were Mayans?
translation.zh: 你 认为 小孩 是 玛雅人 ？

translation.en: I mean, aren't the Mayans extinct?
translation.zh: 玛雅人 不是 绝迹 了 吗 ？

translation.en: Didn't they die of some fucked-up disease?
translation.zh: 不是 都 死于 传染病 吗 ？

translation.en: [Amy] Oh, that's great, Eric.
translation.zh: 艾瑞克   真 有 你 的

translation.en: [Eric] We could be walking through an ancient graveyard right now.
translation.zh: 我们 说不定 在 古墓园 上 走 呢

translation.en: Like a bone depository or something.
translation.zh: 像 堆骨山 之类 的

translation.en: -[Stacy] I doubt it. -[Eric mimicking] I doubt it.
translation.zh: - 我 看 不 像   - 对 呀   我 看 不 像

translation.en: Did you just mimic me?
translation.zh: 你 学 我 说话 ？

translation.en: [Eric] No, no, I was agreeing with you.
translation.zh: 没有   我 同意 你 的 意见

translation.en: [Amy] He was totally mimicking you.
translation.zh: 他 就是 学 你

translation.en: [Eric] Was I? Was I really?
translation.zh: 有 吗 ？ 真的 吗 ？

translation.en: [Eric] Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: [Jeff] Oh, wow, look at that.
translation.zh: 你 看看

translation.en: -[Amy] Is... I think this is it. -[Stacy cheering] Finally!
translation.zh: 这 ...   - 总算 到 了 ！   - 我 看 应该 是 这里

translation.en: [Jeff] See, honey?
translation.zh: 看见 了

translation.en: -[Eric whistles] -[Stacy] Wow.
translation.zh: 就是 这里

translation.en: -[Stacy] It's beautiful. -It is.
translation.zh: - 好 美 啊 ！   - 的确
